story:
Camp CoachArt is proud to be presented by 

Mercedes-Benz of Beverly Hills 

We are also thrilled to have in kind partners such as Dreamworks, Disney Interactive Media Group, Whole Foods (Fairfax), Snikiddy Snacks, FUZE, JAKKS Pacific Toys and more!

Our Story

Join CoachArt and give 50 chronically ill kids a summer camp experience! Playing and attending summer camp seems like a natural part of being a kid, but for a child battling an illness it is often the exception--not the rule. This is where CoachArt comes into play.   CoachArt improves the quality of life for chronically ill youth and their siblings, by taking their minds off chronic pain & isolation, and getting them back in the game of life, through play.
 CoachArt provides FREE personal lessons in the arts and athletics taught by volunteer mentors. Starting this summer CoachArt is offering 50 youth a summer camp experience at NO COST.  Activities will include Animation workshop from Dreamworks, glass blowing, FOCUS FISH circus fun, Hip Hop DJ, Handstand Kids cooking classes, Yoga, Pilates, Acting with Kids in the Spotlight, guitar and vocal workshops and much more.

The Impact

This isn’t just any summer camp.  Specifically designed to cater to the special needs of this population, the expertise of physicians and nurses has been solicited to provide the best environmental conditions for patient participants. Their choice prescription: lots of laughter & play.
 Research shows that laughter is healing, play is productive and putting a smile on the face of a child can improve their health and possibly even extend their life. This is why CoachArt exists.  
 But play doesn’t stop at the patient. We’ve learned that the art of play benefits the volunteer mentor, siblings and the entire family. At CoachArt, we call this “The Art Of Improving Lives,” and it’s why we continue to expand our community of care.

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support to bring arts & crafts, sports and fun to our campers. The cost per student for camp is $100 per week, and we are asking for your individual pledge in reaching our goal of $5,000.00. There are many levels of contribution, and your support is tax deductible. From $25 to $1,000 and above, every donation is appreciated and every supporter will receive a special gift for their contribution. Won’t you help a CoachArt camper by giving them Permission to Play at CoachArt Summer Camp?

Other Ways You Can Help

For more information on CoachArt Camp for chronically ill children, to volunteer or learn more about the organization log onto www.coachart.org and pass this link along to a friend.  Thank you for being a part of our Community of Care.

story:
Who we are:

Hi! We are Fantasy Fines, a sports social media company. We are 4 working professionals from Austin, TX with backgrounds in sports, technology, law and culinary arts who have grown tired of sports figures being paid lots of money despite making stupid decisions and performing poorly. Players, coaches, referees, and teams should have to pay attention to those who truly pay their salary - YOU, the sports fan.

 

 Examples:

 

Pacquiao vs Bradley             Replacement Refs                  Lang Gets Kicked                   

 

Mission:

It is our mission to create an online community that offers sports fans the chance to generate a positive impact on the world simply by sharing their input about the sports they love. This is done in a few easy steps:

 

1)    We give sports fans the ability to hold sports figures accountable for their actions on or off the field. This is done by giving users the ability to create online “Fines”, or what we refer to as “Tiks”, represented as a dollar figure. Rarely is only one fan upset about something that happened, so other members of the Fantasy Fines community will be able to view the Tiks that have been created and add (UpTik) or subtract (UnTik) from the total, depending on their opinion of the offense.

 

2)    When a Tik reaches a threshold sufficient to qualify as significant “social pressure”, Fantasy Fines will approach the sports figure (the Tik-E) with our users’ dissatisfaction level and offer them a chance to socially redeem themselves by donating $500.00 to charity. This action closes the Tik with the FF community, and represents the Tik-E acknowledging to the fans that their voice has been heard and that it matters.

 

We have completed our business plan, marketing research and marketing plan along with the first phase of our website and social media outlets. Now we need your help to raise an additional $50,000 to complete our “Final Road to Launch”, which includes much needed enhancements, such as a comments section for individual Tiks, a forums section, internet and email marketing, charity awareness campaigns, etc.

 

To thank you for your contribution, we will provide perks such as: free lifetime licenses to use our android/iphone app, free lifetime licenses to create/vote on unlimited Tiks, Fantasy Fines T-shirts, and free $20.00 Yahoo Sports Fantasy league accounts.   

 

Your contribution will help us generate funds for charities that are working toward a brighter future for the world.



Impact:

  • To drive financial donations into charities coffers

  • To hold sports figures accountable

  • To create a “one stop shop” platform for fans to have one united voice

  • To create a platform for fans to be able to provide input on decisions that affect the game or team before the decision is made.  

  • To raise awareness of charities and their social causes

  • To improve sports figures image/reputation among fans

 


How is was created:

Christian and James were watching a World Series game between the Texas Rangers and the San Francisco Giants at the 04 Lounge in Austin Texas when two outfielders were running down a fly ball but they neither collided nor caught the ball.  Essentially, both players failed to communicate while running down the pop fly thereby letting it drop into the field of play and therefore failing to do their job for which they are paid millions of dollars to perform.  Christian became so incensed that he stated that both players should be fined for failing to do their job.  After a bit of back and forth discussion about how to enforce the fines, the conversation stalled and Christian and James went on to other topics. A couple of days later James spoke with Christian about fans being able to create “fantasy fines”.  The company and concept was formed from that point forward.



Management Team:

Lounge Notion Inc. founder and co-founder, Christian Gaines and James Irish respectively, have been best friends for over 20 years having grown up together in Richardson, Texas. Christian is a Chef while James has worked in numerous sales roles for computer hardware, computer software, and Unified Communications.  De is the “sports social media consultant” for Fantasy Fines, providing direction for both marketing and content. Prior to Fantasy Fines, De has spent more than 10 years in the sports radio/TV business working as a talk show host and social media manager.  Currently, De does the weekend show on Sports Radio 610AM in Houston,Texas.

 

What We Need & What You Get:

In order to get Fantasy Fines off the ground we need your help! We need to fund Website Marketing ($19500), Android and Iphone Apps ($18000), Custom Forums and Comment Integration ($5500), Contingency Issues ($5000) and Fantasy Fines Ad Server ($2000). Our $50,000 goal is the bare minimum we need to fund the company. Anything in excess of our goal will make it that much easier to get off the ground.

 

Budget Breakdown:

$19,500  Website Marketing & Advertising

$18,000  Android & Iphone apps

$5,500    Custom Forums and Comments

$5,000    Contingency Issues

$2,000    Fantasy Fines Ad Server

 

 

About Those Perks:

We're accepting contributions in various amounts, from $1 to $250. However, we understand times are hard and parting with funds may not always be easy. Please just know that you can support us by helping us promote.

 

 For instance:

  • Word of mouth is the best kind of advertising. And then there is Facebook, Twitter and Youtube. These are easy to use tools and great for sharing with your friends. Also, send emails sharing our links to your friends and co-workers. Please help spread the word about Fantasy Fines.
  • Have a sports blog? Please share our story. Contact christian@fantasyfines.com
  • If you are a company that would be interested in partnering with us please contact james@fantasyfines.com

 

 

 

                     

Men & Womens T-Shirts:

 


Thank You From The Fantasy Fines Team

story:
A WORD FROM JOHN:

Hey guys. Thank you all so much for your donations! But I have to admit that this all would not be possible if it wasn't for a great guy I met through Reddit. His name is Chris (Reddit handle Kings_Haven) and if it wasn't for this guy selflessly offering his time to set up a fundraiser for this cause then my family would have never set this one up for me. I respectfully declined his help but it was him who took the initiative and gave us the idea to use this site for our cause. My eternal gratitude goes out to him and he deserves all the credit for this wonderful idea. Thank you, Chris. You are a Saint among the masses!!

-John 

 

The back story

Hello everyone,

My name is Laura and I created this fundraiser campaign to help out my brother John, who on Sunday, 9/23/12, contracted Necrotizing Fasciitis, more commonly known as Flesh Eating Bacteria. He got this bacteria through a small cut on his right pinky finger after he put his hand in a koi pond to retrieve a football that had landed there.

Less than 36 hours later, John was in the ER with the bacteria quickly eating away his pinky and traveling up his arm. Ever since, he has been in the hospital undergoing blood tests and antibiotic treatments. John has been to the local ER, 2 doctors, a hand specialist, a plastic surgeon and an infectious disease doctor.

Recently he has learned that the tip of his pinky has turned gangrene and he will need a partial amputation. He has documented his experience and has received a lot of online support from the Reddit.com community. His album can be found here (WARNING: some of the images may be disturbing):

http://imgur.com/a/CuxUZ

My brother has received tons and tons of support and kind words from other Redditors. He has provided an invaluable service to those that have shared his story, including many microbiology students who will be using his case in their studies and classes.

I have created this campaign in hopes of collecting donations to help pay down some of his medical costs. My brother has only recently elected medical benefits and does not curently have a policy with his insurance company. Therefore, all expenses will be out-of-pocket.

Each and every contribution will go towards the medical bills accrued during his treatment and rehab. My brother works as contractor and makes his money based on the hours he works. This unfortunate event has put my brother out of work while he is in the hospital and therefore has no income. Your contributions will greatly alleviate the financial stress for my brother and my family as a whole once he begins his recovery.

Our Campaign and Perks to you

We set our goal at $5,000. Every cent will go towards any medical bill generated from hospital stays, antibiotics, surgeries, ambulance rides.

As of the creation of this campaign, we are currently offering just one perk since money is tight for us right now.

1) $5 donation - You will receive a personalized email of appreciation and a shout-out post on this campaign's Facebook page

The best part of this fundraiser is that failure is not an option. Even if our goal is not met, the money generated will still go towards the cause.

The Impact

The real impact of this fundraiser is to show care and compassion to one individual that has done so much for his family, friends and everyone else around him. My brother is an invaluable aspect to my life and the lives of all he interacts with. Your donations will help him stay on track towards his life and career goals, while effectively diminishing extra stressors stemming from his incident.
 
Even $1 makes a difference. We can all remember a turbulent time in our lives where we desperately reached out to those around us for help and consoling. Please consider being that one person that can make a difference in another's life that was abruptly shifted off course.
 
Other Ways to Help
 
If your donation is not possible, you can help by spreading the word to others. Share this campaign fundraiser's goal on Facebook, Reddit, email or any other source of comunication.
 
Even your time reading into this means a lot to my brother, me and the rest of my family.
 
Thank you for your sincere consideration!

story:
My name is Nola Hammon,

I grew up in the Centennial Park and Colorado City area. I have always been amazed at the effect physical health made on all aspects of my life. For me it was sports, but since having to rule the WNBA out as a future career choice, I began to question what my passion truly was. I’ve known for years that I wanted to help myself and others achieve a healthy lifestyle. Despite this, I’ve never had the know-how or confidence to even present the idea out loud. Luckily, John Barlow did it for me. Forward Fitness is very excited to create a place for our community to achieve a healthier and happier lifestyle as we all move forward!

When I first started, I had no idea where to start! Personal training will be available to those that want one on one focus or just assistance in getting familiar with different cardio and strength training workouts.

We’ve created this campaign to help determine how many people are interested, as well as to help us solidify our business plan. We need to know how many members we will need to accommodate.

By contributing $25 to our goal, you will be pledging to be a member of Forward Fitness: A fitness facility open to all those looking to advance their life in a positive and healthy way. However this is no-commitment, no-contract no-obligation pledge. We are confident that you will love our facility and be a longtime member.

When we’ve reached $5000, we will have met our target number of members. The doors will be open to members in July 2016.

If you sign up now, your first month will be free and your $25 will go towards your second month. We hope you continue to follow this page and spread the word around town! 

For more information and to get involved go to forwardfitnessfacility.com or like our “Forward Fitness” Facebook page.

story:
Chpoco is the best remedy for stress.

Forget about medicines and depressants, if you support Chpoco company, you will not need them anymore.

There are millions of situations in which Chpoco may help you. These are some of them:
1) If you are in bad mood, Chpoco will help you.

2) If your boss irritates you, use Chpoco. Or you can give him Chpoco as a present.

3) If you are tired, sit down in an armchair and take Chpoco. It will help you to get a fatigue over.



4) If your wife or a husband is shouting at you, use Chpoco.

5) If you got lost in the forest or in the mountains, you are scared and in panic, use Chpoco.

6) If your neighbours bother you, use Chpoco.

7) If you got robbed, but Chpoco had not been taken away, use it.

8) If the neighbour's dog does a poo on your lawn, use Chpoco.

9) If a child does not let you watch TV, use Chpoco.

10) If a meteorite is heading towards the Earth, you still have several minutes for Chpoco.

The laboratory of Chpoco carried out experiments on volunteers. You can have a look at the results.






During these experiments no one suffered harm.

Your pets will also like Chpoco.

Chpoco is used among the highest level of authorities. Chpoco can help defuse the scene and solve any controversial question.



Chpoco design:


How to use Chpoco:

Just pop it :)


Timeline:

Risks and challenges:

If you will not support "Chpoco" you have a risk to stay a sad man.

story:
We can make an immediate, massive difference in this wonderful girl's life TODAY!

I am going to keep this really simple. I saw the above video, for the Upsee, in the Spring and was super moved by it. I shared it on Facebook and a friend contacted me to see if I could help acquire one for her friend's daughter.


That is how I "met" Chloe. She is turning 3 on Saturday. She was born with a prenatal spinal cord injury and has never been able to walk. She has required extensive medical care and therapy, and that has meant considerable sacrifice by this hard-working family. Chloe's mom said that this Upsee would be an absolute dream for them. Especially because they are now expecting a second child, and the thought of Chloe being able to play, interacting upright, with her little brother or sister is magical.

You, my friends, are some of the most fortunate people in the world. Many of you are able-bodied to an extreme that most people can't even imagine. Some of you have also overcome extraordinary challenges to get back to that. Lots of you travel the world racing. Others pursue different adventures, each creating a full life of your own design.

I'm asking that you share some of your good fortune with Chloe, and donate RIGHT NOW to this awesome gift! Also, share it on your Facebook wall - who knows who else may want to give a little to make a BIG difference in this child's life!!

(NOTE: This gift will keep on giving! Chloe's family has promised to gift the Upsee forward to another child when Chloe outgrows it!)

(PPS ... If we somehow exceed our campaign goal, we will put the additional funds towards buying an Upsee for another awesome kid!)
story_txt:
We can make an immediate, massive difference in this wonderful girl's life TODAY!


I am going to keep this really simple. I saw the above video, for the Upsee, in the Spring and was super moved by it. I shared it on Facebook and a friend contacted me to see if I could help acquire one for her friend's daughter.

That is how I "met" Chloe. She is turning 3 on Saturday. She was born with a prenatal spinal cord injury and has never been able to walk. She has required extensive medical care and therapy, and that has meant considerable sacrifice by this hard-working family. Chloe's mom said that this Upsee would be an absolute dream for them. Especially because they are now expecting a second child, and the thought of Chloe being able to play, interacting upright, with her little brother or sister is magical.You, my friends, are some of the most fortunate people in the world. Many of you are able-bodied to an extreme that most people can't even imagine. Some of you have also overcome extraordinary challenges to get back to that. Lots of you travel the world racing. Others pursue different adventures, each creating a full life of your own design.I'm asking that you share some of your good fortune with Chloe, and donate RIGHT NOW to this awesome gift! Also, share it on your Facebook wall - who knows who else may want to give a little to make a BIG difference in this child's life!!
(NOTE: This gift will keep on giving! Chloe's family has promised to gift the Upsee forward to another child when Chloe outgrows it!)
(PPS ... If we somehow exceed our campaign goal, we will put the additional funds towards buying an Upsee for another awesome kid!)

story:
Tubeless made easy – no more flat tires

Sick of flat tires when biking? Us too. That’s why we invented milKit, the Swiss made solution for easy measuring and refilling sealant in tubeless tires – which means you can spend less time fixing tires and more time on the bike.

Our campaign at Indiegogo has successfully ended. We have achieved our goal: milKit is available on the market. Thank you all for your great support!

Here you find a list of online shops on where to buy milKit: www.milKit.bike/shop


 benefits at a glance

  • easy to use kit for tubeless systems
  • no more dirty hands
  • no more valve clogging
  • makes tubeless systems reliable

milKit makes tubeless tires maintenance clean, quick and simple. Enjoy a safe ride!


Simple and reliable for a safe ride

milKit is a new system for measuring and refilling sealant in tubeless tires. Unlike traditional tires, tubeless tires don’t use an inner tube. The tire seals directly on the rim. A sealant (milk) is filled into the tire before installation and seals punctures and leaks. The main benefit of tubeless systems is being able to ride at low air pressure for better traction without getting flats, because there is no tube to pinch. Plus you save weight. The maintenance of tubeless tires was tedious – until now. milKit allows a precise and easy measurement of the sealant without removing the tire from the rim and releasing the air pressure. milKit makes riding tubeless systems reliable, simple and safe – plus no more dirty hands.


The core functionality of milKit are the patented valves. They are compatible with all standard rim types. A rubber flap prevents sealant from clogging the valve and allows super-fast inflation without a valve core. 

No flats Better traction Less weight


How to use milKit

Check out our product video to see how easy tubeless system maintenance is with milKit.


  1. Push the applicator into the valve
  2. Let the sealant flow into the syringe and check remaining sealant
  3. Fill the missing amount of sealant into the tire



Approved by the pros

Christoph Sauser: “The milKit valves are great as they don’t clog anymore.”
World Champion, World Cup Champion, Olympic Medalist

Ralph Näf: “The valves are awesome; I save weight of excess sealant in the race.”
World Champion

We received very positive feedbacks to our prototypes from the major players of the tubeless industry including tire manufacturers and sealant producers. Professional mountain bikers like mountain biking legend Thomas Frischknecht tested and liked our prototypes. milKit was also tested by champion Christoph Sauser  under very rough conditions at Cape Epic 2015, one of the most prestigious mountain bike races in the world.


The history of milKit

The idea for milKit was born during a mountain bike trip in the middle of nowhere around Moab (USA), with a flat tubeless tire due to dried out sealant. A problem that those of you that ride tubeless will understand, as you never really know how much sealant is left in the tire, unless you deflate and dismount your tire, which no one really wants to do. That’s why the Swiss mountain bike addict and product development engineer Pius Kobler started to puzzle over an easy to use solution. Now, one year after the first homemade prototypes, countless test rides and the foundation of Sport Components Ltd. with another biking enthusiast and experienced company founder Sven Rizzotti, milKit is ready to be launched to the market.

Pius Kobler, CEO Sven Rizzotti, Sales Anna-Julia Lingg, PR Marketing

story:
Live yoga and fitness classes with world class instructors streaming from the Otari studio. Get real-time pose and form feedback with Artificial Intelligence. 


 




Expert instructors lead top-quality sessions and motivate to keep you engaged. Choose a class for the workout your body needs. Just as you’d expect in the studio, they're here to keep you motivated, disciplined, and accountable.

 

 

OTARI’s intelligent form analysis technology with an instructor’s personalized guidance ensures an effective workout each and every time. 

 




Follow Indiegogo on Instagram and Otari on Facebook and watch our 30-minute class with Otari Yoga  Instructor Amina Taha. 







Lindsey is a Broadway actor and yoga instructor - performing in shows such as Wicked and Bring It On The Musical, and teaching at studios and corporate spaces in New York City. She makes yoga accessible to "every body," and helps students turn up the volume on their intuition. Expect precise alignment, a-ha moments, and humor!

 

 

 

 

Otari's Smart Camera Arm is uniquely offset at the ideal angle to capture the most accurate assessment of your form. From your Chaturanga Flow to your most intense cardio session, Otari continuously analyzes whole-body form with your data never leaving the privacy of the device.

 

As you work out, the Otari camera captures "keypoints" representing the relative position of each joint location in real time.

 

 These keypoints plus additional proprietary data points are cross-referenced against appropriate ranges determined by our team of expert fitness instructors, triggering opportunities for feedback.

 

Otari understands your pace and can tell the difference between slacking off and pushing you too far - and appropriately guides you in either scenario.

 

Your workout metrics are tracked and used to continuously refine your workout - reps, form, balance, heart rate (with smart watch integration), and more feed into the Otari system to create a more personalized experience the more you use it.

 

 

All of this processing takes place locally within your Otari Studio - which means your data NEVER leaves the device unless you opt to share it.

 

 

 

 

Immerse yourself in a live class with engaging instructors who inspire directly from the studio. Receive on-screen and pre-recorded audio feedback in your instructor's own voice - exactly the way they would give it to you in a 1:1 personalized session.

 

 

Watch classes on your own schedule, with instruction and feedback delivered in real time based on intelligent pose analysis data.

 

 

Stay motivated with workout buddies from across the nation. Join your community and hold each other accountable.

 

 

 

 

 

Stay motivated with workout buddies from across the nation with in-app chat and message boards, Join an on-demand class with friends and hold each other accountable.

 

 

Send & Receive "Good Vibes" with others taking the same class as you.

 

 

Not all classes are competitive, but if competition is your thing - see how you stack up against others with team challenges and output goals.

 

 


 

 

 


Get classes and track your progress easily with the Otari app.

Each Otari membership comes with 4 user profiles that you can set up.   Share your Otari with a spouse, parent,  or a friend!
 

 

COMPLETE IN-HOME STUDIO

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

Delivery Guaranteed

Your contribution with us is a  guaranteed purchase, That means if you order Otari with us, you will get it, guaranteed. 

 

 


Help us get to $200,000 and unlock the option of adding  OTARI yoga mat color options.  We will send a survey out and you get to help choose the two new colors!  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What started as sketch is now a reality. Multiple design and prototype iterations over the years have finally resulted in a tested and proven design and technology. 

 

 

Our team is made up of previous athletes and fitness enthusiasts that have the heart and soul necessary to bring Otari into the home. Even more important, we have all individually lived the disappointment of having a less than rewarding home workout and the intimidation of showing up to a group class filled with experts.

We’ve learned that there is no “get fit in 30 day” plan that works for everyone, and that premium streaming content is much more effective when it is personalized for you.  No one person is at the same point in their fitness journey, and we know from our own experience just how important it is that Otari meets you exactly where you are.  Your time and energy are the most important things you have to give each day, and we’re equally committed to delivering an engaging experience you can look forward to each and every time you step on the mat.  For us, Otari is about embracing fitness as an everyday lifestyle, and that’s why we are so excited to experience Otari with the same mindset we know our customers share.

The Otari family is about inclusivity, because we know we are all better when we are supporting each other and celebrating milestones together.  Simply put, we love working on Otari, and can’t wait to share it with you!

 

 

Chris brings a background in data science and computer vision to Otari, most recently doing AI research at Facebook. He’s had multiple false starts trying to learn yoga over the past 5 years - group classes were intimidating as a newcomer, and YouTube videos lacked structure and feedback. Chris cares deeply about building inclusive fitness experiences that support growth in the privacy of home. 

 

Skyler has a strong background in embedded devices and software development, most recently at PwC. He was an avid soccer player his entire life before a string of hip injuries and physical therapy sessions introduced him to the world of at home exercise routines.  Skyler is driven to build scalable workout systems that are personalized to everyone’s unique life journey and goals.

 

Joelle has spent most of her career developing consumer lifestyle brands. She was drawn to Otari when she saw how easy it makes squeezing in a studio-quality workout whenever she has a few spare minutes. Joelle understands the value of anything that elevates and simplifies a busy person’s lifestyle, and is excited to spread the word about something that has been such a game changer in her own life.



JOIN US AND SHARE OTARI WITH THE WORLD

Refer a backer and get one more month of the Otari App!




 

                                                  WE'VE MADE IT SIMPLE AND EASY!

1. Log in to your Indiegogo account. Go to the Otari campaign page and copy your unique link. 



 

2. Paste the link to any web site with high traffic, such as your mailing list, Facebook, Linkedin, personal blog, Pinterest, Twitter, Instagram or any forum you regularly visit.

Share this link with members of large Facebook/Linkedin groups. There are a lot of popular Facebook and Linkedin groups that you might consider sharing with.

3.  We track all your referrals and will let you know by the time campaign ends how many free months you've earned to add to your Otari membership.   

 

 

 

 

 

We will ship to the U.S, Canada, and a limited number of countries. VAT and GST are not included. Please see the reward/perk  for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

We plan to ship starting in October 2020*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own an OTARI at this one-time, exclusive to Indiegogo low pricing. You also get exclusive access to provide us valuable feedback that will shape future generations of OTARI

 

 

 

Earn 7% cashback



 

 

 

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story: My sister, Kim has been through some trying times over the last year. She went through a divorce, had a small stress filled breakdown and helps out effortlessly with our father who had a stroke this year. Kim is trying to get back on her feet since her divorce but finding it hard since losing her job and entering into a new job. She needs a new place to live, to buy a car, since she only shared one vehicle and couldn't afford the payments. She has been living with me to try and save some money, but it is a slow process. She desperately wants to get back out there on her own, but is so depressed about money, she feels she will never get there. However, she pushes through with the needs of my dad and hides it from him so it won't upset him. I am wanting to give some light at the end of the tunnel of all this. I am asking for some help to get her back on her feet and have some independence again. Thank you in advance for any contribution you can give.

story:
Our Story

Why we decided to do this - 

Our team decided we wanted to get into a business together, but struggled to find a passion. That's when Covid-19 hit and we realized our motivation - Helping Others. Three things capture the attention of public health officials:

1.) Social Distancing

2.) Masks

3.) Washing your hands (95% of people do not properly wash their hands!)

Only one of those existed prior to the pandemic. As we did some research, we realized we have a seriously FILTHY problem on our hands! Before coronavirus, up to 1 million people die each year related to poor hand washing. 

In addition, it's costing our economy roughly $800 billion in sick days and lost productivity, raising the cost of healthcare, and eliminating disposable income, it's a loss for everybody. 

How we plan to fix it  - 

We decided to revolutionize the way businesses can motivate and ensure it's staff are properly washing their hands which will save lives, money, and generate new revenue streams and marketing campaigns. Making $$$ for businesses seems a bit insensitive as motivation, but we realize the only way to fix our problem and change our society was to make the solution affordable, marketable, and save money. The cost of the system has to make business sense to pass along the benefits to the folks that matter the most, us!  

Why does hand washing need to be revolutionized? 

It's because of the lack of accountability and assistance. We have two primary groups: folks that don't care to wash their hands and need better accountability than a sign saying "employees must wash hands" and folks that don't realize they are not washing their hands properly and need assistance.

 

​We created a mission to be the leading name in safety and hygiene automation and fix the problem using IoT (Internet of Things). Our physical RFID/WiFi device, the SudHub™, is at the core of the BandIt Bands system. It displays a cycle of vibrant LED icons and a blinking LED circle to engage and assist in proper hand washing. It can also play tunes and chimes to help the visually impaired. The SudHub™ works with our BandIt Bands and a guests' personal devices. Our system then reports back to the company weekly to identify and incentivize top scorers, and check in with those missing the mark. 

SudHub™​

Our flagship, revolutionary device that educates, aids, and ensures proper hand washing. There's a lot to like about the SudHub from the sleek design, energy efficiency, and durable build!

BandIt Bands™​

RFID bands that work with the SudHub™ used to identify users. They are lightweight, durable, recyclable, reusable, easy to clean, and marketable. Bands come in many colors and custom logos can be added. RFIDs can be pendants, badges, etc. for industries that cannot use bands.

 

The Design -

The design is carefully crafted to be installed on both countertops and walls. We have a future design without WiFi using just battery power to be installed virtually anywhere for just consumers aid, including portal hand wash stations, that will work with personal products and integrate into health applications. 

 

The design is a brushed metal side, LED lights, and an engaging light ring to aid in timing. The power source is a low voltage, energy efficient plug. It was built side-by-side with former Apple engineers to ensure premium build, durability, and maximum functionality! 

 

Customization -

The SudHub™ itself is versatile with the ability to come in other colors, customizable faceplates, and a selection of chimes and tunes! 

 

Why the name BandIt Bands?  ​

We originally thought "Halo" sounded cool, since it keeps you safe, but then we realized raccoons make more sense. They constantly wash their hands, their name translates to "washing bear," and they also look like bandits with their adorable faces. Instead of "Halo", we decided BandIt Bands™. The name relates to both our iconic raccoon, "BandIt", and our simple directions on how to use our system, "Band It", as in band your hands!  

 

Risks and challenges

Our budgeting constraints remain in manufacturing and marketing. We have wrapped up our prototype and have completed our database which is fully tested and ready to handle any volume of consumers. Our biggest challenge will be creating an inventory to shift from make-to-order to make-to-stock. Basically, we won't have to collect orders first, then have them built, then shipped, which slows down the install time from time of purchase. With units on hand, we can quickly have them delivered. As for the marketing risk, we are limited on capital budget hindering us from commercials, big budget videos, as you can see from our video, and the funds needed to capture a large audience through marketing.

 

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

Everyone's going to boast about their design, but we've researched and critiqued every chip, screw, edge, panel, particle, atom...well maybe not that far, but it was designed with 3 things in mind. Safety, Quality, and Efficiency with the most affordable cost. We worked with prior Apple engineers to build a design from scratch using the best industry techniques we could imagine, a custom PCB board, and a sleek-durable formfactor. As for the bands themselves, we have gone with trusted partners that have already distributed similar bands with high resistance to millions of customers.

Reusability and recyclability

Computer chips are naturally recyclable, and we do not use batteries that need to be specially recycled. The material on the formfactor is a recyclable hard shatter resistant plastic that can be recycled. In addition, our team's warranties and commitment to service, repairs, and reusing parts will prevent our product from landing in a landfill.

Environmentally friendly factories

Our design was engineered to use less WiFi and a passive RFID system which in return demands less power. It's incredibly energy efficient, and only requires a 12V barrel plug to operate.

We have two primary groups: folks that don't care to wash their hands and need better accountability than a sign saying "employees must wash hands" and folks that don't realize they are not washing their hands properly and need assistance. ​We created a mission to be the leading name in safety and hygiene automation and fix the problem using IoT (Internet of Things). Our physical RFID/WiFi device, the SudHub™, is at the core of the BandIt Bands system. It displays a cycle of vibrant LED icons and a blinking LED circle to engage and assist in proper hand washing. It can also play tunes and chimes to help the visually impaired. The SudHub™ works with our BandIt Bands and a guests' personal devices. Our system then reports back to the company weekly to identify and incentivize top scorers, and check in with those missing the mark. SudHub™​Our flagship, revolutionary device that educates, aids, and ensures proper hand washing. There's a lot to like about the SudHub from the sleek design, energy efficiency, and durable build!BandIt Bands™​RFID bands that work with the SudHub™ used to identify users. They are lightweight, durable, recyclable, reusable, easy to clean, and marketable. Bands come in many colors and custom logos can be added. RFIDs can be pendants, badges, etc. for industries that cannot use bands. The Design -The design is carefully crafted to be installed on both countertops and walls. We have a future design without WiFi using just battery power to be installed virtually anywhere for just consumers aid, including portal hand wash stations, that will work with personal products and integrate into health applications.  The design is a brushed metal side, LED lights, and an engaging light ring to aid in timing. The power source is a low voltage, energy efficient plug. It was built side-by-side with former Apple engineers to ensure premium build, durability, and maximum functionality!  Customization -The SudHub™ itself is versatile with the ability to come in other colors, customizable faceplates, and a selection of chimes and tunes!  Why the name BandIt Bands?  ​We originally thought "Halo" sounded cool, since it keeps you safe, but then we realized raccoons make more sense. They constantly wash their hands, their name translates to "washing bear," and they also look like bandits with their adorable faces. Instead of "Halo", we decided BandIt Bands™. The name relates to both our iconic raccoon, "BandIt", and our simple directions on how to use our system, "Band It", as in band your hands!   Risks and challengesOur budgeting constraints remain in manufacturing and marketing. We have wrapped up our prototype and have completed our database which is fully tested and ready to handle any volume of consumers. Our biggest challenge will be creating an inventory to shift from make-to-order to make-to-stock. Basically, we won't have to collect orders first, then have them built, then shipped, which slows down the install time from time of purchase. With units on hand, we can quickly have them delivered. As for the marketing risk, we are limited on capital budget hindering us from commercials, big budget videos, as you can see from our video, and the funds needed to capture a large audience through marketing. Environmental commitmentsLong-lasting designEveryone's going to boast about their design, but we've researched and critiqued every chip, screw, edge, panel, particle, atom...well maybe not that far, but it was designed with 3 things in mind. Safety, Quality, and Efficiency with the most affordable cost. We worked with prior Apple engineers to build a design from scratch using the best industry techniques we could imagine, a custom PCB board, and a sleek-durable formfactor. As for the bands themselves, we have gone with trusted partners that have already distributed similar bands with high resistance to millions of customers.Reusability and recyclabilityComputer chips are naturally recyclable, and we do not use batteries that need to be specially recycled. The material on the formfactor is a recyclable hard shatter resistant plastic that can be recycled. In addition, our team's warranties and commitment to service, repairs, and reusing parts will prevent our product from landing in a landfill.Environmentally friendly factoriesOur design was engineered to use less WiFi and a passive RFID system which in return demands less power. It's incredibly energy efficient, and only requires a 12V barrel plug to operate.

story:
The eagle has landed and Team Germany has made it safely to Syracuse, NY to prepare and compete at the World Indoor Lacrosse Championships. Everyone has spent a lot of time in the gym, at the wall, shooting on goal and getting ready to represent Germany, but more than that everyone has put it in the work to go to battle with their friends and not let them down! During the regular seasons, the players play for 11 different teams and have met plenty of times on opposite side of the ball and yet here they are, on a different continent thousands and thousands of miles away from their regular surroundings just being … friends. They hang out, just like all Germans do, in Lederhosen. They have breakfast together, they do yoga together and eat at weird American places. But even their friendship is transcended by lacrosse and everyone comes together as the best possible team they can be once the national anthem starts playing. And they need your help!

Each player is confronted with a large financial commitment of over 2500 $ to participate and represent his country. The large expenses are necassary to afford filghts , hotel and gear. For most players its the first time to cross the atlantic and enter the USA.

In addition the team is facing a tournament participation fee of 3000 $.  In this fundraiser we want to raise money for the tournament fee to reduce the over all costs for each player and support the team while competing with the best players in the world.

For further Information check out www.dlaxv.de

story:
Short Summary

With Albio-product we will give paramedics and ER’s a tool to get accurate information for making live saving decisions in treatments and medications. Naturally, through fast treatment and right decisions by professionals, patients will gain the greatest value from Albio.  

Alcohol is the most used drug in the world. More than 45 % of the paramedics’ and ER’s patients have been drinking. Alcohol has also a great influence in treatment methods and medications. Yet, so far the only reliable way to get information about the blood-alcohol level has been clinical lab test.  Unfortunately, clinical lab test takes time, is expensive and requires special instrument and skilled staff.

Albio gives reliable result in less than 20 seconds, is at least 10 times less expensive, and doesn’t require special skills nor expensive clinical lab instruments. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

As Albio is an IVD (In Vitro Diagnostic) medical device it has to fulfill corresponded requirements coming from different standards and authorities. We are happy to tell that most of those requirements are already fulfilled and relevant tests have been done, tested and passed.

With sufficient funding, which we are looking with this campaign, we are able to finalize our product development and start production. At this state we are concentrating on CE-marking and preparing the FDA application.

The above mentioned activities needs be done anyhow. The success of this campaign speed up the finalization of the development process and access to market.

We will publish all of our backers names on our webpage for a year (exept anonymous).

From the picture below you can see how we have planned to use the funding.




The Impact

Why this is so important? Paramedics and ER’s have managed so far without this? What is actually the impact of Albio?

Here’s some authentic comments from our partners around world;

France; I just asked information from some my best contacts. The feedback is very good about the concept, particularly for brain attack discrimination. (Our business partner)

USA; This is something that we have been looking for a long time. (ER-department director)

UK; is this testing possibility finally possible, I am so happy for this (Paramedic doctor and a volunteer worker in Detoxification center for young persons)

Finland; we can save lives with this (A paramedic from a rural area ambulance)

Even though Albio has a great impact in actual patient care, it also has a great impact in economics. Since this testing is 10 times cheaper than current methods, it brings up to 25 USD savings for each test. Also, if paramedics have correct information already in the field, the need of emergency transportation decreases. This means less expenses and less risks in traffic. 
Risks & Challenges

We have spent a lot of time and effort on product development, supplier and manufacturing relationships prior launching our funding campaign. We can’t mitigate all of the risks, but by waiting until this stage of development, we believe that we have minimized most of them. Of course, with any project like this, there are potential risks in final product development and supply procurement.

Final product development: It is very unlike, but yet possible that we have to make changes to our hardware. We are really convinced that this isn’t the case anymore and the product development can be finalized by making small adjustments to the test strip. In case there is a need to make hardware changes, it will most likely affect us by delaying our entry to the market with 2 months due the additional testing and tuning.

Supply procurement: As a small start-up, we are aware that our purchase volumes are and will be quite small, comparing to other industries as glucose. In our fortune the quantities of ingredients that we need, are small and this haven’t been an issue to us before. For the whole time we have been developing our product, we have also been creating close relationship with our suppliers, all of whom have been eager not only to supply us with what we need but to help us creating this new product.

Frequently asked questions

Q. How Albio is helping paramedics in patient medication?

A. Several medicines, typically pain-killers, react with alcohol. Thus it is very important to know what the blood-alcohol level for dosage is.

Q. Why breath analyzers are not good enough?

A.  Breath analyzers are measuring alcohol form air-flow, which is not the same as blood-level. Breath air-flow is effected by recent drinking and smoking and even eating though the residues of mouth mucous membrane.

Q. Why breath analyzers are often not utilitarian?

A. Patients who are unconscious or who have a bad trauma or who are hysterical are not able to blow.

Q. Is Albio usable for police in drunken drive controlling?

A. Technically yes. That will need some changes in legislation and we have not started that process yet.

Q. Albio has a battery, how long does it last and can user change it?

A. With one battery you can make about 1 500 tests. Albio gives a warning in good time before the battery is low and user can easily change the standard-type battery.

Q. Albio is giving the result to the screen. Is the result also stored into memory?

A. Yes, Albio has a memory for more than 940 test results. The data-exchange can be done by standard USB-cable connection.

Q. The price of clinical lab alcohol test is between 25 – 35 USD during the day time. What is the price of Albio meter and test-strip?

A. The estimated price for Albio meter is 200 USD and to test-strip 3 USD.

Q. What is the status of Albio CE and FDA approval?

A. Albio meter has CE and FDA marking and approval. Test-strips are estimated to have CE-approval during next coming months. Test-strips FDA approval will be planned during this campaign.

Q. Is Albio operating in the same way than glucose meters?

A. Yes it is just as simple and easy to use. The sample is drawn from the fingertip in same way than in glucose meters. Albio test-strips are also used in “glucose-meter way”.

Q. Do I have to send Albio meter to maintenance for calibration?

A. No, Albio meter doesn’t need any expensive maintenance type calibration. User can do it very simply by running the calibration strip.

Q. Who owns the IP of Albio?

A. Pal Finland Ltd.

Q. PAL Finland seems to be very small company, what kind of research recourses do you have?

A. PAL Finland is a networking company, this means that during the development phase our own payroll has been kept as small as possible and most of the needed special resources  have been purchased from our partners like Finland State Research Centre, University of Eastern Finland, Kuopio University Hospital and multiple companies both from Finland and from abroad.

Q. Does PAL Finland have experience about the international operations?

A. Yes it does. The core group of PAL Finland have more than 150 working years’ experience in international operations and diagnostics.

Q Why this kind of test haven’t been done before?

A. A Very Good Question, we don’t know the answer. We are very proud about our success in making this brilliant innovation real.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help us by spreading the word and telling people about our cause and campaign. Visit our homepage at www.albiotest.com. Share this on your Facebook page or at twitter. We truly believe on our product and we are sure it will have a huge impact on patient care and prevent false diagnosis.

story:
Greetings, Heroes!

Who We Are:

We are Marc Dalesandro & Scott MacDonald, two veteran comic-book readers and role-players from Nova Scotia, Canada.

What we have:

Heroics is a Superhero themed Table Top Role Playing Game.

For those of you unfamiliar with this type of game, it is played around a table with a group of friends who want to collaboratively tell a story about Superheroes. Each person creates their own Hero to represent, and one plays the general narrator, guiding the players through the story, using the rule book to help set players boundaries and abilities.  Have a look at this link for a full explanation.

Our game is based on a d100 system, which means that you will always be rolling 2 10 sided dice, or a 100 sided die.  We have created a large variety of superpowers for you to choose from for your character, around 60 to date, but one of the key concepts that we both very strongly push is that the rules are there to support the characters, so if you want to do something that is not in the rules, just ask and the person running the game should create it for you, with you.

One of the things that makes our game different, and better, than others is a very robust Critical and Fumble system, as well as lots of information on how powerful you are, and can become.  Most Superpowers have detailed tables to show you how your powers will scale as you continue to grow stronger.

Why did we create it?

In 2002, we created the first edition of Heroics, a superhero role-playing game that arose from our mutual frustration with the bland, disinteresting, and just plain unfun superhero RPGs out there at the time.

Heroics has evolved through four editions since then (4th edition source book shown above), and has been played by small, dedicated gaming groups in our home province of Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, and Maine.

We have used free software to create and edit the game so far, and low-cost options such as Hero Machine for the artwork in our game manual and on our wiki & weebly, which can be found at http://heroicsuniverse.wikispaces.com/ and http://beheroic.weebly.com/ .

Why the Campaign?

This campaign is to raise money for the 5th edition of Heroics, which will feature original artwork, professional printing and binding, and an initial print run of 500 hardback source books.

By using Indiegogo to fund the book, we can keep the prices very low - aiming for $10-$20 cover price, which is about one-half what similar RPGs sell for.

What you Get:

As a contributor, you can receive our thanks in the source book by name, have a character in our universe named after you, and receive a free copy of the finished Heroics source book.

We have set this Indiegogo campaign up as a flexible-funding project. Should we fail to reach our goal, we will still use funds received to complete and print the Heroics RPG, though we will be forced to scale down our ambitions to some degree. Such a scale-down might include black-and-white printing, softback rather than hardcover source book, and less original artwork. All perks will still be awarded to contributors who meet the funding levels outlined.

Please be assured that the 5th edition of Heroics *is* being completed and printed. You will get to play this game. The only question is what form the final product will take. We'd like to make it as polished and professional as possible.

This game has been a labor of love for both of us for over a decade. Our superhero world has a detailed history, over 200 characters with unique backgrounds and powers, and intriguing possibilities going forward. The Heroics game is designed for fast-paced, fun play - with no need to resort to modeling battles or spending long minutes arguing over obscure rules.

If you enjoy superheroes, comic books, role-playing, and fun games in general, please consider supporting Heroics!

If you can't contribute right now, maybe you know someone who might be interested. We would be extremely grateful if you would mention this campaign to anyone you think might be willing to help.

Thanks for reading!

story:
HELP US BREAK THE GUINNESS WORLD RECORD FOR THE WORLD'S LARGEST CONDOM!!!

 

This may sound like a funny headline, but our mission is very serious.

 

We are creating the world's largest condom to draw attention to the HIV/AIDS crisis in Africa. In conjunction with this world record, we will be distributing ONE MILLION condoms and education materials to rural areas of Zambia, where help is needed most!

Our goal is to break the world record and hold a press conference in Africa to give the world a wake up call! At the same time, our efforts will save lives through our direct involvement and distribution to the people of Africa.

 

HOW THIS GOT STARTED

 

Hi, My name is Atul Gupta.  I live in California, and am as American as the next guy. One of things that is different about me is that I grew up in Africa, Zambia to be specific.  I love what my life is today, and this would not have been possible without my childhood in Zambia. 

 

My heart bleeds for the people of Zambia and their suffering. The Global HIV/AIDS crisis has affected Zambia in a huge way. In addition, traditional beliefs make it hard to fight domestic abuse and violence against women & children. The infant mortality rate is at almost 10%, while almost 30% of all people under 18 are affected by HIV/AIDS.  The life expectancy is at a mere 51.  Zambia receives a lot of international aid & support, however, it almost never reaches the people in greatest need.

 

Now that I am settled in life, and have some clarity on who I am, I want to complete my life circle.  I want to raise awareness of the HIV/AIDS crisis in Zambia, by creating the world’s largest condom for Zambia. At the same time, I want to distribute millions of condoms, educating people about HIV/AIDS prevention, living with HIV/AIDS, and information on available treatment options in Zambia.

 

We need your support in the manufacture of the world’s largest condom, and donations of condoms. We also need your financial support for the transport and delivery of these condoms. Each condom that reaches someone, will save someone from potentially contracting HIV. This is a war that only be fought, 1 instance at a time.

 

Remember that, your gift is going to change the lives of people without means or a voice. People who need and deserve support, but are not able to receive for many reasons.

 

Each and everyone of us is part of the same fabric of life.  While we may not want to think bout it, but what happens across the globe has an impact on us and our lives.  What does one do when a garment is coming undone or damaged in someway? We repair it.  This is what you will be doing, repairing some of the rips in this garment we call humanity.

Our goal is to break the world record and hold a press conference in Africa to give the world a wake up call! At the same time, our efforts will save lives through our direct involvement and distribution to the people of Africa.
 
HOW THIS GOT STARTED
 
Hi, My name is Atul Gupta.  I live in California, and am as American as the next guy. One of things that is different about me is that I grew up in Africa, Zambia to be specific.  I love what my life is today, and this would not have been possible without my childhood in Zambia. 
 
My heart bleeds for the people of Zambia and their suffering. The Global HIV/AIDS crisis has affected Zambia in a huge way. In addition, traditional beliefs make it hard to fight domestic abuse and violence against women & children. The infant mortality rate is at almost 10%, while almost 30% of all people under 18 are affected by HIV/AIDS.  The life expectancy is at a mere 51.  Zambia receives a lot of international aid & support, however, it almost never reaches the people in greatest need.
 
Now that I am settled in life, and have some clarity on who I am, I want to complete my life circle.  I want to raise awareness of the HIV/AIDS crisis in Zambia, by creating the world’s largest condom for Zambia. At the same time, I want to distribute millions of condoms, educating people about HIV/AIDS prevention, living with HIV/AIDS, and information on available treatment options in Zambia.
 
We need your support in the manufacture of the world’s largest condom, and donations of condoms. We also need your financial support for the transport and delivery of these condoms. Each condom that reaches someone, will save someone from potentially contracting HIV. This is a war that only be fought, 1 instance at a time.
 
Remember that, your gift is going to change the lives of people without means or a voice. People who need and deserve support, but are not able to receive for many reasons.
 
Each and everyone of us is part of the same fabric of life.  While we may not want to think bout it, but what happens across the globe has an impact on us and our lives.  What does one do when a garment is coming undone or damaged in someway? We repair it.  This is what you will be doing, repairing some of the rips in this garment we call humanity.

story:
On January 24th, 2011, a representative of the Toronto Police gave shocking insight into the Force’s view of sexual assault by stating: “women should avoid dressing like sluts in order not to be victimized”. A tremendous outcry followed this statement leading to the first SlutWalk taking place in Toronto on April 3rd, 2011. Immediately, Toronto’s sentiment spread throughout the world, with women, men, and children taking to the streets to demand their right to live without fear of sexual violence based on their life choices; clothing, work, lifestyle choices, etc.


Most people know someone who has been sexually assaulted.  Whether it was your parent, your friend, your teacher, your sibling, your classmate, you teammate, or yourself. Sexual assault has touched all of us.  Slutwalk is an opportunity to stand, walk, chant, and shout our powerful opposition to the practice of sexual harassment and assault and its commonplace appearance in our society.  It's a place to stand strongly and unconditionally with all survivors of sexual assault. It is a time to say that it is never, under, any circumstances, the fault of the victim, and to show solidarity to all who have experienced sexual assault. It is a place to express our demand for control over our own bodies, physical and sexual space.  It is a place to condemn the policies that embolden and condone a rape culture and to call out their disproportionate impact on the LGBTQ community, poor and working class people, people of color, immigrants, incarcerated individuals, soldiers, people who engage in sex work, and individuals with physical or mental disabilities.  Slutwalk is a place to demand a world free from sexual assault, a place to discuss, think, and debate about what type of women’s rights, gay rights, and gender equality movement we want, and decide what direction we as a community want to walk in.


*August 10th, 2013 will be the third annual Slut Walk DC*


What We Need & What You Get

We would like to offer the participants, involved organizations, speakers, performers, and surrounding community the most quality event possible. Every year we try to top the last!

  • One of the biggest changes we are making this year is the additional performances we are implementing into the speaker and entertainment portion of the rally. In addition to the traditional speakers, we are adding a variety of entertainment; such as empowering musical performances, a small skit from a local acting studio, and more. In order for these individuals and groups to have full impact, we need them to be able to have quality equipment; microphones, sound systems, screens etc.
  • August is an extremely hot and humid month in DC and past years we have been lucky enough to be able to give out water to everyone. This year, we would also like to be able to set a up a few "cool down stations" with fans in the area so that we can assure that everyone is safe in the excitement and heat.
  •  There is an amazing group of volunteers who help us throughout the year with promotion, banner making, brainstorming etc. We would like to be able to supply them with the material they need in order to help, such as paper and markers for poster making and provide them with VOLUNTEER t-shirts the day of the event so that they can be acknowledged for their efforts.
  • Other expenses include: printing flyers, executing awareness and promotion videos, compensating offical photographers and installation/sound professinals, tents, tables and chairs, supplies for fundraisers, promotional materials, stage set up, generator for electricity, decor, and other unexpected expenses.


"Historically, the term ‘slut’ has carried a predominantly negative connotation. Aimed at those who are sexually promiscuous, be it for work or pleasure. It has primarily been women who have suffered under the burden of this label, and whether dished out as a serious indictment of one’s character or merely as a flippant insult, the intent behind the word is always to wound. So we’re taking it back. “Slut” is being re-appropriated.

We are tired of being oppressed by "slut-shaming"; of being judged by our sexuality and feeling unsafe as a result. Being in charge of our sexual lives should not mean that we are opening ourselves to an expectation of violence, regardless if we participate in sex for pleasure or work. No one should equate enjoying sex with attracting sexual assault."

-From SlutWalk Toronto


Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone who is interested in Slut Walk DC will be able to contribute money. If you are not able to contribute financially there are a number of ways you can still help out...

  • Educate yourself: Take the time to do your research on cases of victim blaming and observe your community and yourself for signs of such activity.
  • Start the conversation: Educate others on the importance of ending this cycle of victim blaming.
  • Spread the word: Talk about Slut Walk. Tweet about Slut Walk. Share our Facebook page and Website
  • Get active: Get your butt out to Slut Walk 2013!!

 

All hope and good vibes for another AMAZING year for Slut Walk DC. We can not do it with out you. Lets rebuild our community, redefine our words, and unlearn these negative social standards!

-SlutWalkDC

story:
Who am I?

I am a registered nurse working on my master's degree, and I am excited you are here to read more about the work I will do in Myanmar. My goal is to raise $2,240, so I may volunteer to address any health concerns and supply any basic neccessities in small community in Myanmar.

My belief as an active citizen is to serve locally as well as globally. I became involved internationally when I studied abroad and when I visited my roots in Vietnam. It opened my eyes to many issues that we take for granted here in the United States. I have since dedicatd myself through my career to live a life of service.

The Opportunity

This coming April, with your help, I will have the opportunity to join fellow volunteers, health professionals, and anthropologists in Myanmar, a country located in Southeast Asia. For 10 days, we will work in a local village providing comprehensive health services and assisting in obtaining health, educational, and agricultural resources for the community.

How can you be involved?

You can do all the following: donate, share the link via Facebook, tweets, email, blogsites to allow more supportors and donors to contribute to this cause. Your dedication and involvement are not only important to me, but very important to the people, the children, and families in Myanmar.  A person can make a world of difference.

Donations, where do they go?

Your donations will provide basic meals, transportation, and housing for me. In addition, donations will help purchase the following items: government school tuition and weekend English classes, medicinal herbs and drugs, reading books, and agricultural supplies.  Everything will strictly go directly for this cause and only this cause.

The Motto

Empowering people to help themselves

story:
So Here's The Story...

I fractured my 5th metatarsal two months ago, and I am more than knee-deep in medical bills. Having just graduated from undergrad with a stack of student loans and no health insurance, I hit the poor graduate jackpot with my slip and fall. After trying to work for the money on my own, I am finally ready to ask for help. So: I need YOUR help to pay off my $1500 of debt.

 

How You Can Help

$1500 is the full amount I owe to the hospital. By contributing anywhere from $1-$100, you will be helping me immensely! Check out the sweet perks you will get under the donation amounts! Totes worth it.

 

Let Me Break it Down

As an actress, I wanted to provide a source of entertainment as an incentive for you to contribute (as any good performer should, right?). Three weeks ago, many talented people came together to create a fake indie trailer entitled ‘The Lumpy Bones’ to tell a hyperbolic version of my accident...because dramatizing things is funny and enjoyable. Money raised beyond the $1500 will go to the gifted and generous videographer and editor of the trailer, Jon Richardson. So, if you’re not so eager to support me, know that you’re also supporting artists!


If You Can't Donate...

If you can’t give money (which I obviously understand), share our trailer and this Indiegogo link! Spread the word about this campaign and please help me meet this goal! Also, watch the trailer a million times and giggle. Literally, a million.

story:
Hi everyone, my name is Susan. I’m starting this campaign on behalf of my friend’s mother, Janet Clark, who recently suffered a stroke. 


Her accident began on Monday, March 3rd. Her day started off like any other. When arriving on the first floor of her home, a sudden wave of cold swept over her and she started to experience a runny nose. After a short sniffle, she was met with an unexpected pain in her head, something that she would later describe as a “bubble popping inside of her brain.”

Thinking that it was nothing more than a headache, Janet continued about her day as she normally would. She made a series of phone calls and then left the house for her job at a nearby clothing store. As time progressed, what was happening inside of her brain started to manifest itself externally. While in her car, she became incoherent and dizzy, struggling to keep her vehicle on the road. Once at work, her co-workers immediately noticed that something was wrong. She appeared disheveled, couldn’t speak and was generally “not herself.” 

Doctors informed her family that the situation was serious, critical and that her immediate family should be present. Over the course of the next week, Janet fought her way back from an unthinkably dark and scary place. She still has a long way to go, but her spirits are up and she has made incredible progress. 

I’m starting this campaign because Janet is not only a mother to her two children, but a mother to everyone she meets. She is a pillar of her community, as she is always volunteering with different organizations, teaching religion to young kids and helping out wherever she is needed. The door to her home is always open and she embraces everyone who comes into her life with open arms. She is warm, kindhearted and truly “one of God’s angels.” Janet will require additional care in order to make a full recovery. She will also, undoubtedly, have a number of medical bills from her extended stay at Stony Brook University Hospital. The amount of good that Janet provides to this world can’t even begin to be measured – but perhaps we can give it a try through this campaign. Your support is very much appreciated. Please help us meet this goal! Thank you so much for your support! - Susan Bellido
