story:
Pre-Order Your Evo Eau Water Filtration Bottle TODAY!


Most water filtering bottles don't remove much from your water. The majority comply with NSF 42 standards which legally means they only have to reduce 50% of Chlorine in your water - that's it. They don't remove things like lead or mercury or filter out oil products like Benzene and PCB's. And they certainly don't address dangerous carcinogens like Chromium-6.


We’ve created a reusable water bottle that will filter up to 99% of the contaminants listed above and hundreds of others. This is the Evo Eau bottle and it can change the world. We are committed to creating a culture where safe, pure water exists wherever people need it.That's why 5% of all our profits will go towards providing relief-grade filters in less developed and in-need areas around the world.   


About the Filter

The filter features ionic absorption depth filtration technology that reduces up to 99% of contaminants in municipally supplied water. The Evo Eau filter has your back where others fall short; providing you with water that tastes great and gives you peace of mind. In order to bring you the cleanest water, our filtering process happens at a molecular level.

Special Blend


The filters is comprised of an activated carbon base with its true filtration power residing in its special blend of ingredients. Making the perfect filters is all about balancing blended media to achieve optimal reduction rates. In order to remove contaminants the filter must strike a balance of opposites. Every contaminant targeted has specific molecular properties that attract them. By utilizing specific media contaminants have a high affinity for we can selectively filter water for dangerous contaminants while leaving behind healthy trace minerals.

Dual Seal Technology


This structural feature keeps water from getting into the drinking straw without going through the filter first. The dual seals force water to go through the filter rather than around it. Bonding the filter to the housing ensures the efficacy of the filter throughout its life.

Controlled Porosity


The pore size of the filter is integral to its overall performance. The pores in this filter are absolute 5 microns. We have found this is the optimum size for municipally supplied water at is allows more volume to flow through the filter while simultaneously increasing intimacy time between contaminants and media.

Longevity


The filter will clean at least 25  gallons of water. That's equal to 266 single use plastic bottles - saving you money and the environment the burden of more plastic water bottles. On average each filter will last 3 months.


Break the Bottled Water Cycle Now!


Laboratory Images

Taken with an electron microscope, these before and after images display our filter's efficacy. Filled with millions of interconnected pathways its easy to see how we can remove up to 99% of contaminants from your tap water.

This 100X magnification shows how the filter removes dangerous things that you can’t see. The used filter shows high concentration of contaminants as well as one large organic particle. As water travels through the outer walls of the filter it encounters millions of interconnected pathways - all designed to remove up to 99% of contaminants from the water.

The surface of the filter is the first area to encounter contaminants. This image shows how contaminants smooth over the jagged edges of the filter as they build up.  Highlights in the used filter show heavy concentrations of contaminants that are permanently attached to the filter. Bacteriostatic ions keep any potential living bacteria from leaving the filter - ensuring only clean water enters the drinking straw.

This cross section image displays the complex structure of the filter. The used filter  image shows how contaminants smooth over the jagged edges of the filter as they continually build up during use. Contaminants go through a process called ‘chelation’ that results in a  permanent bond between the contaminant and filter; trapping them indefinitely.

At 400X magnification, this image captures the depth of one of the millions of interconnected pores in the Evo Eau filter. You’ll notice in this image that contaminants appear to be less vibrant than the ones on the Outer Surface images. This shows that most of the contaminants are being removed almost immediately as they enter the filter.

Contaminants Removed: The Short List

Basic Needs Initiative

The Basic Needs Initiative is  purpose driven program formed to provide relief quality filters to those who need them most. Whether the need falls in a developing nation or here at home, we are pledging 5% of our profits our Basic Needs Initiative. These filters require no tools, are powered by gravity and surpass government purification standards. They will play a key role in preventing water borne bacteria and virus from ever being consumed.

Why not build wells like everyone else?   

Building wells has become a very popular philanthropic trend. While we are 100% behind those that build wells we know from experience in our own backyard that wells do not guarantee clean water. By supplying these relief grade filters - people will not have to rely on wells; rather any well or fresh water source can be used with confidence.

Filter Drops    

Inspired by Blake from Toms shoes. We too see the need to meet those who we are helping. There is no better way to empathize with those in need than to see and experience their strife first hand. Come along with us on a filter drop! We believe in culture of responsibility - experience philanthropy first hand with Evo Eau's Basic Needs Initiative filter drops.

Filter In Your Favorite Color!

Inspiration

During college on a trip with my bike racing team through the San Joaquin Valley of California, I noticed something funny how water was treated there.

In the places we would stay, I noticed that the hosts would always boil their water before using it. I was informed that the San Joaquin Valley had become host to numerous contaminants in their public water. I had also learned that many of the children in the valley had become stricken with Leukemia because of the Chromium 6 (and other heavy metal) contamination found in the water that - in reality could not simply be boiled out. During that trip all I could think about was clean water not just being a problem in third world countries, but a problem in my own state. People were and still are being poisoned by their tap water. When I got home, I began taking steps to find a way for people like those in the San Joaquin Valley to drink clean water anytime, anywhere, from any tap water source.

Evo Eau For All

"Evo Eau is made for us, the people who are tired of spending money on change and seeing little in return."

If you drink water - You need this bottle. 

The Evo Eau   bottle is made for everyone who wants to drink safe, great-tasting water for a fraction of the cost of bottled water. Its made for those who want to reduce the carbon footprint of themselves and their family. Evo Eau is for us, the people who are tired of spending money on change and seeing little in return. 


Design Features

Designed by Dario Antonioni founder of dLab Orange 22 - this bottle arrives at the intersection of art and technology. Designed to be both fashionable and functional this bottle is built for everyone and ready for anything. From the gym to black tie affairs the Evo Eau bottle will easily find its way into your daily life. 


Security    

Threaded cap and bottle interface ensures water stays in the bottle and does not leak onto valuables

T2O Spout

Open and close the flip top with ease. Just slightly twist the upper ring to open and close the spout. This patented design makes accessing water a cinch. This sanititary solution keeps dirty hands and fingers from ever touching the mouthpiece.

Support  

Fingers and caribeaners alike will rejoice in this highly functional, robust closed loop.

Kissable   

Comprised of medical grade silicone, this mouthpiece will make even the softest lips feel pampered.

Body

Constructed from BPA free Tritan, this non-toxic, non-leaching 'co-polyester' offers the clean aesthetics of glass with the forgiveness of plastic.

The Kink

The bottle is designed with an intentional kink. This not only makes drinking more comfortable, it aids in filling in shallow sinks or weak flowing fountains.

Flow

Water flow is crucial to the filtering process. This design makes filtering water as easy as drinking through a straw.

H.E.H.F. Filter   

High Flow High Efficacy filter, specifically formulated by Clearbook for Evo Eau, removes up to 99% of contaminants for 25 gallons all while maintaining excellent water flow rates.

Replaceable Parts

The Evo Eau bottle was designed with durability in mind. The bottle completely modular. While the bottle is made of the highest quality materials, we know that sometimes things get broken. Each and every piece of this bottle is replaceable. Making a modular product is not just for replacing, its also for making it your own. Want a different color handle than your lid? No problem? Every piece on our bottle is interchangeable and if we hit our stretch goal of $250,000 we will launch our OPEN SOURCE PROGRAM.


Bottled Water vs. Tap Water


Not only have we read reports of  the negligence big water companies have for the environment, but according to the NRDC their bottom line comes before you and your family's well-being:

Current Tap Water vs Bottled Water Quality Regulations:

"The NRDC conducted a four-year review of the bottled water industry and the safety standards that govern it, including a comparison of national bottled water rules with national tap water rules, and independent testing of over 1,000 bottles of water. Our conclusion is that there is no assurrance that just because water comes out of a bottle it is any cleaner or safer than water from the tap. And in fact, an estimated 25 percent or more of bottled water is really just tap water in a bottle -- sometimes further treated, sometimes not" - NRDC.org

What Happens When We Meet Our Goal?

We are looking to raise funds for our first production run. We've poured our heart and soul into this project and need your help to bring it to life. We've done our homework, engineered every detail and unscrupulously patented our baby.  Funds raised with this project will go directly to finalized tooling and our first production run!  Whether its sharing this video, liking our Facebook page, or backing us here we appreciate your time and support.

Become A Brand Ambassador!

If you are like us, you want to tell all of your friends about this amazing bottle! That's great! We want you to do that! In fact, we would be honored to give you your bottle for free as soon as you become a Brand Ambassador.

How do you become a Brand Ambassador?

Its easy! All you have to do is refer 4 people, who also support us (by Pre-Ordering at least 1 bottle) via Facebook or Twitter and we will give you your bottle free! All you have to do is share our campaign after your Pre-Order!


Frequently Asked Questions:

When will my Evo Eau Bottle Ship?

We are scheduling our first run to ship at the end of November 2013 - Just in time for Christmas!

What materials are the bottle comprised of?

The bottle body will be made with BPA Free - non toxic, non leaching Tritan, with it's components being made from BPA Free - non toxic non leaching medical grade polypropylene. These materials are current industry standards for durability and quality. 

International Shipping?

Absolutely. Please add $15 for all non-USA purchase.

How do I know when my filter is spent?

As the filter begins to the end of its life in your Evo Eau bottle the pores will become congested with contaminants, clogging pores and slowing flow rate. Efficacy of the filter is maintain throughout the life of the filter - even if flow rates slow. To maintain ideal flow rates we recommend changing the filter every 25 gallons. That's about 115 refils per filter.

Is the filter replaceable?

Yes! The bottle is entirely serviceable. Each and every part can be disassembled and replaced easily - including the filter.

Can I use my Evo Eau bottle with a stream?

No. The filter in the Evo Eau bottle is specifically formulated to remove contaminants found in municipally supplied water only. Municipalities spike water with disinfectants to kill any living pathogens  that could be in the water. This filter is made to remove those disinfectants and a host of other daily contaminants found in municipal water.

The Evo Eau filter is absolute 5 microns which is the optimum pore size for municipal water supplies. Fresh water supplies may be contaminated with pathogens such as Cryptosporidium or Giardia. Both of these pathogens are smaller than 5 microns and may potentially pass through the filter. It is for this reason that we recommend you use your Evo Eau bottle with municipally supplied water only!

How do you track referrals for Brand Ambassadors?

Indiegogo is nice enough to include tracking software into every campaign. When you post about this campaign - we get notified! If you share your Pre-Order on Facebook and people click your post and arrive here - we get notified. You probably guessed it: If your Facebook post generates Pre-Orders - we get notified. We encourage you to keep tabs on your friends but it's nice to know that we will too! How will know you when you've become a Brand Ambassador - you'll get notified!
story_txt:
Pre-Order Your Evo Eau Water Filtration Bottle TODAY!


Most water filtering bottles don't remove much from your water. The majority comply with NSF 42 standards which legally means they only have to reduce 50% of Chlorine in your water - that's it. They don't remove things like lead or mercury or filter out oil products like Benzene and PCB's. And they certainly don't address dangerous carcinogens like Chromium-6. 


We’ve created a reusable water bottle that will filter up to 99% of the contaminants listed above and hundreds of others. This is the Evo Eau bottle and it can change the world. We are committed to creating a culture where safe, pure water exists wherever people need it.That's why 5% of all our profits will go towards providing relief-grade filters in less developed and in-need areas around the world.   About the Filter

The filter features ionic absorption depth filtration technology that 
reduces up to 99% of contaminants in municipally supplied water. The Evo
 Eau filter has your back where others fall short; providing you with 
water that tastes great and gives you peace of mind. In order to bring you the 
cleanest water, our filtering process happens at a molecular level. 
Special Blend
The filters is comprised of an activated carbon base with its true filtration power residing in its special blend of ingredients. Making the perfect filters is all about balancing blended media to achieve optimal reduction rates. In order to remove contaminants the filter must strike a balance of opposites. Every contaminant targeted has specific molecular properties that attract them. By utilizing specific media contaminants have a high affinity for we can selectively filter water for dangerous contaminants while leaving behind healthy trace minerals. Dual Seal Technology
This structural feature keeps water from getting into the drinking straw without going through the filter first. The dual seals force water to go through the filter rather than around it. Bonding the filter to the housing ensures the efficacy of the filter throughout its life. Controlled Porosity
The pore size of the filter is integral to its overall performance. The pores in this filter are absolute 5 microns. We have found this is the optimum size for municipally supplied water at is allows more volume to flow through the filter while simultaneously increasing intimacy time between contaminants and media. Longevity
The filter will clean at least 25  gallons of water. That's equal to 266 single use plastic bottles - saving you money and the environment the burden of more plastic water bottles. On average each filter will last 3 months. 

Break the Bottled Water Cycle Now!

Laboratory Images
Taken with an electron microscope, these before and after images display our filter's efficacy. Filled with millions of interconnected pathways its easy to see how we can remove up to 99% of contaminants from your tap water. 


This 100X magnification shows how the filter removes dangerous things that you can’t see. The used filter shows high concentration of contaminants as well as one large organic particle. As water travels through the outer walls of the filter it encounters millions of interconnected pathways - all designed to remove up to 99% of contaminants from the water.

The surface of the filter is the first area to encounter contaminants. This image shows how contaminants smooth over the jagged edges of the filter as they build up.  Highlights in the used filter show heavy concentrations of contaminants that are permanently attached to the filter. Bacteriostatic ions keep any potential living bacteria from leaving the filter - ensuring only clean water enters the drinking straw.

This cross section image displays the complex structure of the 
filter. The used filter  image shows how contaminants smooth over the 
jagged edges of the filter as they continually build up during use. 
Contaminants go through a process called ‘chelation’ that results in a  
permanent bond between the contaminant and filter; trapping them indefinitely. 

At 400X magnification, this image captures the depth of one of the millions of interconnected pores in the Evo Eau filter. You’ll notice in this image that contaminants appear to be less vibrant than the ones on the Outer Surface images. This shows that most of the contaminants are being removed almost immediately as they enter the filter. 
Contaminants Removed: The Short List
Basic Needs Initiative
The Basic Needs Initiative is  purpose driven program formed to provide relief quality filters to those who need them most. Whether the need falls in a developing nation or here at home, we are pledging 5% of our profits our Basic Needs Initiative. These filters require no tools, are powered by gravity and surpass government purification standards. They will play a key role in preventing water borne bacteria and virus from ever being consumed. 

Why not build wells like everyone else?    
Building wells has become a very popular philanthropic trend. While we are 100% behind those that build wells we know from experience in our own backyard that wells do not guarantee clean water. By supplying these relief grade filters - people will not have to rely on wells; rather any well or fresh water source can be used with confidence. 
Filter Drops     
Inspired by Blake from Toms shoes. We too see the need to meet those who we are helping. There is no better way to empathize with those in need than to see and experience their strife first hand. Come along with us on a filter drop! We believe in culture of responsibility - experience philanthropy first hand with Evo Eau's Basic Needs Initiative filter drops. 


Filter In Your Favorite Color!



Inspiration

During college on a trip
with my bike racing team through the San Joaquin Valley of California, I
noticed something funny how water was treated there. 


In the places we would stay, I noticed that the hosts
would always boil their water before using it. I was informed that the San
Joaquin Valley had become host to numerous contaminants in their public water.
I had also learned that many of the children in the valley had become stricken
with Leukemia because of the Chromium 6 (and other heavy metal) contamination
found in the water that - in reality could not
simply be boiled out. During that trip all I could think about was clean
water not just being a problem in third world countries, but a problem in my
own state. People were and still are being poisoned by their tap water.
When I got home, I began taking steps to find a way for people like those in
the San Joaquin Valley to drink clean water anytime, anywhere, from any tap
water source.



Evo Eau For All
"Evo Eau is made for us, the people who are tired of spending money on change and seeing little in return."

If you drink water - You need this bottle.  
The Evo Eau   bottle is made for everyone who wants to drink safe, great-tasting water for a fraction of the cost
of bottled water. Its made for those who want to reduce the carbon footprint
of themselves and their family. Evo Eau is for us, the people who are tired of spending
money on change and seeing little in return.  
Design Features

Designed by Dario Antonioni founder of dLab Orange 22 - this bottle arrives at the intersection of art and technology. Designed to be both fashionable and functional this bottle is built for everyone and ready for anything. From the gym to black tie affairs the Evo Eau bottle will easily find its way into your daily life. 


Security     
Threaded cap and bottle interface ensures water stays in the bottle and does not leak onto valuables
T2O Spout 
Open and close the flip top with ease. Just slightly twist the upper ring to open and close the spout. This patented design makes accessing water a cinch. This sanititary solution keeps dirty hands and fingers from ever touching the mouthpiece. 
Support   
Fingers and caribeaners alike will rejoice in this highly functional, robust closed loop. 
Kissable    
Comprised of medical grade silicone, this mouthpiece will make even the softest lips feel pampered.
Body 
Constructed from BPA free Tritan, this non-toxic, non-leaching 'co-polyester' offers the clean aesthetics of glass with the forgiveness of plastic.
The Kink 
The bottle is designed with an intentional kink. This not only makes drinking more comfortable, it aids in filling in shallow sinks or weak flowing fountains. 
Flow
Water flow is crucial to the filtering process. This design makes filtering water as easy as drinking through a straw. 
H.E.H.F. Filter    
High Flow High Efficacy filter, specifically formulated by Clearbook for Evo Eau, removes up to 99% of contaminants for 25 gallons all while maintaining excellent water flow rates. 
Replaceable Parts 
 The Evo Eau bottle was designed with durability in mind. The bottle completely modular. While the bottle is made of the highest
quality materials, we know that sometimes things get broken. Each and every
piece of this bottle is replaceable. Making a modular product is not just for
replacing, its also for making it your own. Want a different color handle than your lid? No problem? Every piece on our
bottle is interchangeable and if we hit our stretch goal of $250,000 we will
launch our OPEN SOURCE PROGRAM. 
Bottled Water vs. Tap Water


 Not
only have we read reports of  the negligence big water companies have for the environment, but according to the NRDC their bottom line comes before you and your family's well-being:
Current Tap Water vs Bottled Water Quality Regulations:


"The NRDC conducted a four-year review of the bottled water industry and the safety standards that govern it, including a comparison of national bottled water rules with national tap water rules, and independent testing of over 1,000 bottles of water. Our conclusion is that there is no assurrance that just because water comes out of a bottle it is any cleaner or safer than water from the tap. And in fact, an estimated 25 percent or more of bottled water is really just tap water in a bottle -- sometimes further treated, sometimes not" - NRDC.org
What Happens When We Meet Our Goal?

We are looking to raise funds for our first production run. We've poured our heart and soul into this project and need your help to bring it to life. We've done our homework, engineered every detail and unscrupulously patented our baby.  Funds raised with this project will go directly to finalized tooling and our first production run!  Whether its sharing this video, liking our Facebook page, or backing us here we appreciate your time and support. 
Become A Brand Ambassador!

If you are like us, you want to tell all of your friends about this amazing bottle! That's great! We want you to do that! In fact, we would be honored to give you your bottle for free as soon as you become a Brand Ambassador. 
How do you become a Brand Ambassador?
 Its easy! All you have to do is refer 4 people, who also support us (by Pre-Ordering at least 1 bottle) via Facebook or Twitter and we will give you your bottle free! All you have to do is share our campaign after your Pre-Order! 
Frequently Asked Questions:
When will my Evo Eau Bottle Ship?
We are scheduling our first run to ship at the end of November 2013 - Just in time for Christmas!
What materials are the bottle comprised of?
The bottle body will be made with BPA Free - non toxic, non leaching Tritan, with it's components being made from BPA Free - non toxic non leaching medical grade polypropylene. These materials are current industry standards for durability and quality. 
International Shipping?
Absolutely. Please add $15 for all non-USA purchase. 
How do I know when my filter is spent?
As the filter begins to the end of its life in your Evo Eau bottle the pores will become congested with contaminants, clogging pores and slowing flow rate. Efficacy of the filter is maintain throughout the life of the filter - even if flow rates slow. To maintain ideal flow rates we recommend changing the filter every 25 gallons. That's about 115 refils per filter. 
Is the filter replaceable?
Yes! The bottle is entirely serviceable. Each and every part can be disassembled and replaced easily - including the filter. 
Can I use my Evo Eau bottle with a stream?
No. The filter in the Evo Eau bottle is specifically formulated to remove contaminants found in municipally supplied water only. Municipalities spike water with disinfectants to kill any living pathogens  that could be in the water. This filter is made to remove those disinfectants and a host of other daily contaminants found in municipal water. 
The Evo Eau filter is absolute 5 microns which is the optimum pore size for municipal water supplies. Fresh water supplies may be contaminated with pathogens such as Cryptosporidium or Giardia. Both of these pathogens are smaller than 5 microns and may potentially pass through the filter. It is for this reason that we recommend you use your Evo Eau bottle with municipally supplied water only!
How do you track referrals for Brand Ambassadors?
Indiegogo is nice enough to include tracking software into every campaign. When you post about this campaign - we get notified! If you share your Pre-Order on Facebook and people click your post and arrive here - we get notified. You probably guessed it: If your Facebook post generates Pre-Orders - we get notified. We encourage you to keep tabs on your friends but it's nice to know that we will too! How will know you when you've become a Brand Ambassador - you'll get notified!

story:
Yelkis Miranda

Yelkis had a successful operation!  For my thoughts and photos see www.thelostandfoundhostel.com/blog/

For what to do with the extra fund join the discussion at https://www.facebook.com/lostnfound.panama

I visited Yelkis and her mother in Panama City and the operation was a success.  Although it shows we have a ways to go to reach $1000 we have met our funding goal and do not need further donations.  Raquel, Yelkis’ mom has been holding cake raffles and her husband has been picking up hours working here at The Lost and Found.  I am going to write a blog shortly and sending out perks.  The blog will share details of the operation, including documents written by Yelkis’ doctor as well as my thoughts on funding through Indiegogo. I will try to email each of individually but please feel free to send a message to my personal email pmcgreer@yahoo.com (Patrick)

In the words of her mother Raquel, Yelkis is a happy, social girl.  She is an excellent student who likes to have fun and makes friends easily.  She has a bright future, however she is having difficulties keeping up her studies because she is losing her vision.  Above all, she has a big heart.

Yelkis is the daughter of, Raquel, an employee here at The Lost and Found Hostel.  She is in need of a corrective eye operation for a condition that, if left untreated, could lead to permanent blindness.  In this part of the world, $1000 is a large amount of money, and beyond the ability of Yelkis' family to afford.

The Lost and Found Hostel is committed to positively impacting the community we call home.  While we will surely do our part, we would greatly appreciate the generosity of any past or present guests who are willing to donate to the cause.  That's where you come in.

What You Can Do And What's In It For You

Our goal can be reached by just twenty people donating fifty dollars.  To accommodate people who are here currently and those who have stayed with us in the past, we have come up with a range of incentives and prizes.  If you are not a current guest, all shipping costs will be covered by Lost and Found.  All prizes come with a handwritten thank-you letter from Yelkis herself (in Spanish and English).

Even if you don't feel comfortable with the amount it takes to reach an incentive, every little bit helps!  Regardless if the goal amount is reached or not, every penny raised here will go towards Yelkis' expenses.

The Impact

A donation of even $10 USD will put Yelkis' and Raquel's family that much closer to ensuring Yelkis' vision remains intact and her academic potential unharmed.  100% of the money raised in this campaign will go towards the cost of surgery and the recovery process.

Attached below are authorized documents detailing the procedure and why it is necessary.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, or don't feel comfortable contributing, there are more ways you can help.  Please use the share options linked to the campaign to allow more people to learn about Yelkis.  The more people who hear, the better her chances of receiving help get.  Get the word out!

story:
New Year is right around the corner…time to GET IN SHAPE! You join a gym, workout and after go to the closest fast food place. You wait in line for 10 minutes, eat a highly processed high fat meal and proceed to put back on what you just worked off. It’s a vicious cycle…and after a couple of months with few results, you give up.

Or...you go to your gym but on the way call, text or hit your app to Fit & Fast Foods. You place an order for a healthy, organic, tasty, high protein, low calorie meal. You usually have your workout timed, so you know when you’ll be done & when you walk out the door, your order is ready for pick up! Better yet, its waiting right there in the gym parking lot. The food tastes amazing! It’s hot, it’s healthy and it’s convenient. You achieve your weight loss goals 75% sooner and in time for spring. 


                                  Background

I've been in the fitness and health industry for 36 years. After achieving my own personal goals, I discovered helping others achieve theirs was just as rewarding.

The fact is, when it comes time to feeling good, looking good and all out health, 75% of the equation is Nutrition. How many people do you know that workout harder that anyone yet never make significant changes. Does that sound familiar? Is it you?   (For more information) Which is more important; Nutrition Verses Exercise.

  

                           Mission

When asked why those that worked out didn't follow a nutrition program, there were three main answers:  tastes bad, too expense, and it is inconvenient. Our mission at Fit & Fast Foods is to solves all of these problems...


                            Taste

Many of the items have been put together with secret recipes of my full-blooded Italian great-great grandmother.  Others have been created, and all have been taste tested by our partner who was a Master Chef (Barry), and have simply been changed to fit specific health and fitness goals. They will mostly mimic the fast food items we have grown to love...to include multiple breakfast items, burgers and wraps, tacos, hot dogs, non-fried french fries made from both regular and sweet potatoes, salads, pizza, non-traditional items like spaghetti and meatballs (glutton free) and assorted combinations of organic vegetables made with or without sauces, or in soup. It will also include a vegetarian menu.

                          Expense

Fit & Fast Foods will be run out of food trucks/trailers and will be located in front of major gym chains. We have already been in contact with and have an agreement on our first location. Our placement will be an asset to their clientele and therefore once we've proven our worth we will be included in the marketing they've already established (radio and local TV), etc.  They have agreed to place our menus, phone applications, and all promotions in this first location. Since this is direct marketing that is inexpensive for us and no additional cost to them, these savings will be reflected in the prices. 

                        Convenience

One advantage people that already workout have is that they usually know when they will be done. Besides the walk up service, the main order process utilizes pre-orders via online, phone, app to text, or call. You tell us what you would like to eat and when you want to pick it up.  You can pre-pay for your order or pay when you pick it up. It will be ready when you arrive. There are also several pending patents on the wrapping of the foods we will  serve.  Most items will involve peal-and-eat wrappers.

                     

                    What We Need & What You Get

                     

With the teams years of experience in health and weight loss, organic natural health food companies, regular and fast food restaurants, we've put together a detailed business plan. The first step is to develop the prototype to prove production

We have the placement and cooperation of the first fitness facility and all menu items tested. The company we wish to purchase the unit, its wrap, and the inventory for the food plus accessories has been decided on:  

Sales Tax Bond, inspections, insurance, permits, rental fees, costs for running the trailer, and all the marketing tools. We won't bore you with all the details, but the total cost for the first step will be $32,000. Here is the rough breakdown:
 



This is what we're asking for you to help us with. If we make more than required to begin, the extra funds will go toward the next step in this project as we raise the money require through additional campaigns and seeking investors. However, we don't expect something for nothing.  Here are a few of Perks. See Gallery for the details on the rest.

                

 

        

         PERK DESCRIPTIONS

                                   

                                $29 USD 

                       Visual Image board

The visual board is and has been a great value that I include for all of my clients. This provides the positive thinking and motivation behind change and is the secret to succuss.

Send an image of your face with 3 angles, what you would like to achieve and I'll create 3 images of various situations you desire...anything from a outfit, being at an event to a contest. You'll put the images on your computer/cell and print copies for anything you frequent like your wallet and refrigerator to see throughout each day.  You can then repurchase the same program each month for the same low cost and receive an addition 1 per week for the same price.




           

                                   $67 USD 

          The "Walk Around The World" Challenge


 

This Challenge is utilized by the CIA, NGA, NSA and the FBI to give incentive for employees to keep active. For 12 weeks this converts daily activates (cleaning, cooking, computer work…etc.) into miles walked, tells you where you have traveled to and adds challenge to make health fun. We show you already have the fire…then give you the fuel to progress it into a race for health. 

Choose two of your friends to challenge, we send them a humorous e-mail, include the challenge and the date it will start (this would be perfect for the New Years resolution). We will then send weekly updates with humorous race results. You will all feed each other with challenge and fun as you bring the gift of health to loved ones.  

                                                                                                                     

                                     $99 USD 

                Personal weight Loss Coach 16


Loose 30-50 pounds in 16 weeks and be ready for spring with this special program.

This is different than any other weight loss program for it is personal and based on you, your experience and preferences.  You will have our expert to walk you though each challenge, every step and pound of the way. It's private and personal.


Risks & Challenges

Of course there is going to be the same risk and challenges there are with any business...but we believe this ideal will take off on it own regardless. This is going to be hard work...we have no doubts about that but I, and the team, are determined to make this happen no matter what. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, no worries! Please spread the word via every social network ever!  We truly believe in the power of social media and we know it is the best way to get relevant information to the right people. Thanks so much in spreading the link and making this happen. :) 

Nick as he's appeared on Fox 2 News

Celebrate Parfait Day with Nick

 

See Gallery for additional Perk discriptions and appearances by Nick

If we make more than required to begin, the extra funds will go toward the next step in this project as we raise the money require through additional campaigns and seeking investors. However, we don't expect something for nothing.  Here are a few of Perks. See Gallery for the details on the rest.
                
















 
        
         PERK DESCRIPTIONS

                                   

                                $29 USD 
                       Visual Image board

The visual board is and has been a great value that I include for all of my clients. This provides the positive thinking and motivation behind change and is the secret to succuss.

Send an image of your face with 3 angles, what you would like to achieve and I'll create 3 images of various situations you desire...anything from a outfit, being at an event to a contest. You'll put the images on your computer/cell and print copies for anything you frequent like your wallet and refrigerator to see throughout each day.  You can then repurchase the same program each month for the same low cost and receive an addition 1 per week for the same price.





            

                                   $67 USD 
          The "Walk Around The World" Challenge



 
This Challenge is utilized by the CIA, NGA, NSA and the FBI to give incentive for employees to keep active. For 12 weeks this converts daily activates (cleaning, cooking, computer work…etc.) into miles walked, tells you where you have traveled to and adds challenge to make health fun. We show you already have the fire…then give you the fuel to progress it into a race for health. 

Choose two of
your friends to challenge, we send them a humorous e-mail, include the
challenge and the date it will start (this would be perfect for the New Years
resolution). We will then send weekly updates with humorous race results.
You will all feed each other with challenge and fun as you bring the gift of
health to loved ones.  

                                                                                                                     

                                     $99 USD 
                Personal weight Loss Coach 16













Loose 30-50 pounds in 16 weeks and be ready for spring with this special program.

This is different than any other weight loss program for it is personal and based on you, your experience and preferences.  You will have our expert to walk you though each challenge, every step and pound of the way. It's private and personal.



Risks & Challenges

Of course there is going to be the same risk and challenges there are with any business...but we believe this ideal will take off on it own regardless. This is going to be hard work...we have no doubts about that but I, and the team, are determined to make this happen no matter what. 


Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, no worries! Please spread the word via every social network ever!  We truly believe in the power of social media and we know it is the best way to get relevant information to the right people. Thanks so much in spreading the link and making this happen. :) 

Nick as he's appeared on Fox 2 News
Celebrate Parfait Day with Nick
 
See Gallery for additional Perk discriptions and appearances by Nick

story:
VIVOGRAPH – YOU ARE ALWAYS ONE STEP AHEAD

VIVOGRAPH - First of the kind wearable device with a built-in lie detector. Everyone knows that polygraph is a lie detector. Smart watches are even more well known and popular. Vivograph is a combination of smart watch and fitness bracelet with such a unique “cherry on the top” as a polygraph, AKA lie detector.

 

Enjoy your life responsibly and Vivograph will notify you in advance about any emotional or physical changes in your body on the basis of the data from the built-in sensors.

IDPP is unique software that was developed especially for the Vivograph. IDPP allows the built-in sensors to control your psychological state. IDPP makes the Vivograph adjust to your body and identifies deviations in chosen sensors readings, it registers the data on the memory card together with time and location coordinates. Then it allows you to analyze these data.

In the course of development of this gadget, an idea to check the psycho-physiological state of not only the person who is being tested but also the person who is conducting the test has come to us.

Unlike checking the source, checking the owner's emotional reaction to external stimuli, both passive and active, can be carried out continuously and thus monitor her/his psycho-physiological state by adding more sensors.

However, continuous readout of the sensors overloaded the processor and the battery discharged too fast. Therefore, a special program called IDPP was created. With that, the owner can track only the sensors that are most relevant.

IDPP can be set up directly through the Vivograph menu or on the smartphone with help from the mobile app.

 VIVOGRAPH has five basic functions which work using data from different sensors. With IDPP, you can choose sensors that will be activated to employ the function you need. You can choose how often the sensors are read, they can be read continuously or with a given periodicity. You can specify at what value of readings deviation the frequency of sensors reading will increase. You can set up the maximum deviations of the sensors readings at which VIVOGRAPH will give you a warning. 

Most important, the IDDP allows you creating new unique functions taking into account your body’s unique features. You can choose certain sensors and readings which you want to track during a given interval or in relation to physical or psychological load. 

While you’re watching a movie, reading a book, listening to a lecture, just pick the sensors which determine your emotional state so you can see the subconscious response of your body to the information you get.

When doing physical activity, you can track the basic indications of your body in real time via certain sensors: heart beat rate and its changes in time, changes in blood pressure, how much oxygen is in your blood and the temperature of the body etc.

 

 

 

SENSORS & COMPONENTS

 

VIVOGRAPH APP

 

 You can use the VIVOGRAPH just like a smartphone

 

 

Recharging VIVOGRAPH is easy and simple 

 

 

 

​Besides, we offer an optional VIVOGRAPH KIT which you can use to check the honesty of a person you’re talking with

 

 

Main features of the VIVOGRAPH

 

Modeling the VIVOGRAPH prototype

  

 COMPARE WEARABLES

 

We offer Three Sizes to choose from​

  • Size Small      5.4" – 6.5" or 137 – 165 mm
  • Size Large      6.3" – 7.7" or  160 – 195 mm
  • Size X-Large  7.5" – 8.9" or  190 – 226 mm

 

We suggest you Five Colors to choose from

 

 Our Team

We are united by the idea of creating a unique and innovative wearable device to monitor health.

Our team of diverse professionals (psychologists, IT specialists, electronic engineers) has 10 years and more of experience in the respective fields. 

We have vast practical experience proven by tests with positive results and supported with confessions. 

We have developed several types of small-sized detectors. We have created several versions of unique software that allows quick assessment of a person's psycho-physiological state on the basis of bio-sensors readings.

Small-sized detectors with bio-sensors allows not only verify the tested persons honesty, but also to estimate his or her emotional tiredness and physical readiness of the body to perform assigned tasks.

On the basis of our accumulated experience we have developed a wearable polygraph in the form of smart watch - VIVOGRAPH. This device allows its owner to track his/her psycho-physiological state and to control emotions under certain important circumstances.

  

Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How does Vivograph work?​

A: Vivograph has built-in biometric sensors that can detect variations in heart rate, respiration and perspiration rates and skin conductivity. These are all direct indicators of someone's emotional state. Different emotions are matched to biometric signal patterns detected over time, which are then correlated with other types of data such as activity levels, calendar events, and location. This information is all processed by the Intellectual Data Processing Program to give you personalized and actual guidance regarding your physical and emotional state.

Q: What is IDPP?

A: Intellectual Data Processing Program allows you to adjust your Vivograph to take in consideration your particular physical peculiarities and then inform you of any emotional or physical stresses in the most precise way. IDPP gathers data from the sensors and performs processing and comparison of the data against the adjusted settings. Thus, IDPP makes your Vivograph personalized.

Q: How and where I can adjust the IDPP?

A: You have several options. IDPP may automatically tune itself for your body's specific characteristics. You can also choose and adjust any function from Vivograph menu and adjust as you wish. You can use the Vivograph mobile app and adjust the IDPP from your smartphone, or you can directly connect your Vivograph to a PC, or a laptop, and make the necessary adjustments with the help of Vivograph application.

Q: How long does it take to adjust my Vivograph's IDPP?

A: Under normal circumstances, with no emotional or physical stress, adjustments will take no longer than twenty minutes. Then you will have to confirm sensors' readings. You can return to the manufacturers' settings at any time and repeat the sensors adjustments for IDPP.

Q: How often the sensors readings are taken?

A: The smaller the deviation of actual reading from the average-set value, the less the readings frequency will be. Reading's frequency is determined by the IDPP, according to an actuated function. You can also set the frequency manually or decide over specific sensors readings you want to track.

Q: Can I track readings of a certain sensor?

A: Yes, with help from IDPP you can select one or several certain sensors and their readings will be taken at a frequency set by you.

Q: Can I use the Vivograph only as a Smart Watch?

A: Of course, you can. Insert a SIM-card and switch off the IDPP. You will be able to call and text, to shoot video and photographs.

Q: How does Vivograph connect to my smartphone?

A: Vivograph syncs with your smartphone via Bluetooth SMART (low energy). The wearable works in conjunction with the Vivograph mobile app, which is compatible with both iOS and Android. 

Q: Where can I download Vivograph APP from?

A: Vivograph APP will be available for free download on all popular resources, such as Apple App Store, Google Play Store, Android Apps, etc. (to be released early 2017).

Q: What's the difference between Vivograph and other hi tech wearable?

A: Most wearable products focus on physical conditions only (e.g. measuring your heart rate, calculating your physical load) or tend to serve only one specific purpose (eg. analyse your breathing patterns). Vivograph employs the most advanced sensing technology in combination with state-of-art IDPP algorithms to figure out a complex view of your wellbeing (both emotional and physical) and give your data added "life context". Emotions are known to be a major factor influencing your physical health and generally all other aspects of life.

Q: What is the SMART POLYGRAPH function?

A: With this function on, you may monitor your own emotional response on questions you answer. This will help you understand which questions cause the most intensive reaction and you can determine, for example, some topics that you will not want to discuss with a stranger, or, maybe you will want to go through these topics with your psychologist.

Q: Why do I need to watch my STRESS LEVEL?

A: Probability of stress situation occurrence directly depends on severity of emotional and physical stresses. Vivograph will tell you when it is necessary to take a break, relax and have some rest.

Q: Is Vivograph a medical tool?

A: No, Vivograph is not really a medical tool. Sensors readings and information from Vivograph may be used as an advice from a specialist. However, in case of health problems you need to see a physician.

Q: Can I show the Vivograph data to a physician or a psychologist?

A: Yes, it is your right. You can connect the Vivograph directly to a computer and transfer the data, or you can use the memory card for it.

Q: How accurate are the sensors readings?

A: Relative measurement error of sensors is from 0 to 3 %. Absolute instrument error of the sensors is determined by their manufacturers. We cooperate in order to minimize these errors.

Q: Does Vivograph measure the blood pressure?

A: Vivograph is equipped with a photoplethysmography sensor on the basis of which, and of other sensors the IDPP calculates relative change of blood pressure against average set value within a certain period of time.

Q: How long does the battery last?

A: Vivograph can last up to 10 days in the smartwatch mode without charging. It takes about 2 hours to fully charge. Since it uses a Bluetooth Smart (low energy) connection, it will not drain your smartphone battery. IDPP significantly saves the Vivograph battery.

Q: How is Vivograph charged?

A: Vivograph comes with a USB charger which connects to the USB port on the strap's end.

Q: What materials the Vivograph is made of?

A: The Vivograph body is made of high-strength lightweight titanium and aluminum alloy. The silicone wrist strap is hypoallergenic, washable, durable and comfortable.

Q: Is Vivograph water resistant?

A: Vivograph has an ATM rating and it's officially 'splashproof', which means it can resist to usual scenarios like temporarily being under the rain or washing your hands.

Q: Are Vivograph wristbands interchangeable?

A: The bands are currently not interchangeable, as the biometric sensors are built into the band and designed to keep working with you as you move throughout the day.

Q: Is my personal information kept private?

A: We're very much concerned about the privacy of your data. As a user, you are in full control over which data you want to share. Moreover, Vivograph is equipped with a fingerprint sensor and, if it is locked, nobody but you can access the device.

Q: Can I use Vivograph KIT separately from Smart Watch Vivograph? 

A: No, you can not. Vivograph KIT connects and works only with Smart Watch Vivograph. New Vivograph Kit will be possible to connect to a smartphone, a notebook or a PC and conduct the testing.

Q: What is the difference between Vivograph KIT and New Vivograph KIT?

A: New Vivograph KIT, unlike Vivograph KIT, can operate independently. For this purpose it is enough to connect it to a smartphone, laptop or computer and proceed with testing.  Before you do that, you have to install the New Vivograph APP.

Q: What will my pledge be used for?

A: Your financial contribution will go directly towards tooling and manufacturing the first batch of Vivograph. It will also be used toward the research and development involved in bringing this product to market, including implementing a sustainable product lifecycle. Please see our timeline above to get a more detailed picture of our product roadmap.

Q: How do I choose the size and color Vivograph?

A: Our sales manager will contact you prior to shipment to clarify the desired color and size of your Vivograph.

Q: How do I pay for shipping and where do you ship?

A: FREE shipping in the US. Worldwide shipping available. We collect a small fee in order to support our costs for shipping Vivograph nationally and internationally. 

Q: Why do I need the Polygraph?

A: This feature will let you track and control your emotional state, strength of your emotional response to different kind of situations, questions, scenes. Also, you can use Vivograph KIT for fun, e.g. run it as a 'lie detector' on your friends.

story:
THE MILLENNIAL TRAINS PROJECT (MTP) is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization that leads crowd-funded transcontinental train journeys for diverse groups of young innovators (and virtual audiences) to explore America's new frontiers.

To get on board, applicants design a project to advance across the communities where our train stops and then race to be among the first 15 applicants on their selected train journey to reach their $5,000 crowdfunding goal. To learn more about the 2016 journeys click here. The applicant's project is described below.

Through a 10-day cross-country trip, our project will unify multiple stakeholders in the water sector to determine the economic, political, and technical requirements needed to commercialize this technology in developed and underdeveloped communities across the world. 

We are making this:


It's a plant-based water filter that removes over 99.99% of harmful microbes, lead, the taste of chlorine, and other things you don't want to drink.


WHY IT'S IMPORTANT TO US: 

783 million people drink water that looks like this: 

 

Contaminated water is responsible for 3.4 million deaths, mostly children, each year and it claims more lives than malaria, AIDS, and measles combined: more than 15,000 per day. 

No one should die from drinking dirty water. 

Our most recent test showed this:

Our filter uses a plant that grows in almost all the places that lack clean water, meaning this will be BIG.

.

Your contribution will help make this vision become a reality. Learn more below and join our mission!

What You Get

A donation for $10 and our Co-Founders will send you a personal thank you letter for your contribution. 


                  

A donation for $30 and you'll receive three pieces of hand-crafted Massai Jewelry from the Lemongo community, located near Kimana, Kenya. This includes bracelets, necklaces, office ornaments, and will support local businesses. You'll also receive a personal thank you letter. 

A donation for $50 and receive one of our exclusive company T-shirts, officially inducting you into the team, three-pieces of Maasai Jewelry, and a personal thank you letter. 


A donation for $100 and you'll get to choose one photograph, taken by our team, from a Safari at Kenya's Amboseli National park to be enlarged to a 24'' x 36'' poster. It is perfect for framing and hanging in your room, office, or home! Wow! You'll also receive a company t-shirt and a personal thank you letter. 

A donation for $200 and you'll get a Safari poster, a company t-shirt, three pieces of Maasai Jewelry, Moringa leaf powder, a highly nutritious food, and Moringa seed oil, which is great for your skin, and a personal thank you letter.


The Impact

Our 10-day campaign is designed to accomplish the following: 

  1. Identify the perceived risks, needs, unexpected benefits, and incentives of each stakeholder—politicians, investors, private utilities, customers, environmentalists, researchers, etc.—associated with the commercialization of plant-based water treatment technology in the developed and underdeveloped world
  2. Spread the awareness of plant-based water treatment technology and its advantages of use in the developed and underdeveloped world for water treatment to approximately 10,000+ individuals
  3. Spread the awareness of the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals and the desire to provide the rest of the world access to clean water
  4. Speak to at least 2,500 Millennials, or 500 per University visited at each MTP stop, whom are enrolled at a University, about the global water crisis and plant-based water treatment technology with the goal of encouraging more students to pursue social entrepreneurship
  5. Connect to potential Venture Capital firms interested in water treatment technology interested in investing in our company, Everwaters.
  6. Identify the business models of large scale water treatment facilities to determine the operational costs of switching to a plant-based water treatment technique
  7. Design a business model for a municipal water treatment facility using plant-based chemicals
  8. Identify the legislative and technical requirements of using plant-based chemicals by meeting with Water Councils and local politicians
  9.  Unite stakeholders under the mission of pursuing sustainable water treatment practices in the developed and underdeveloped world
  10. Determine a plan to fund and operate the first-ever plant-based municipal water treatment facility in underdeveloped communities
  11. Identify the public health risks of using aluminum sulfate, lime, and chlorine in industrial water treatment practices

Below is the short itinerary as to what Adrian will be doing at each stop of the MTP journey. Some of the plans are bold, but that's the whole point of the journey!

  • In Los Angeles, Adrian will survey locals about current water treatment practices and spread awareness of using plants to clean water. Adrian will speak at UCLA and at the California State University about the water crisis, in both developed and underdeveloped communities, and the potential of using plants to solve these problems; he will also request to meet with Arnold Schwarzenegger, if possible, to spread awareness of our sustainable water treatment technology.

  • In San Francisco, Adrian will request to meet with Public Health Professionals and Water Researchers at Stanford and Berkeley to discuss the health concerns of current water treatment practices and outline the technical requirements associated with plant-based water treatment technology. Adrian will also schedule meetings with local investors to pitch the project idea. If possible, he will reach out to Elon Musk, with the goal championing sustainable technology for the future.  

  • In Denver, Adrian will visit the Colorado River Basin to work with local politicians and researchers to understand the risks associated with the use of chemicals and contamination of the aquifer and the policies associated with its usage; he will present at the University of Denver.

  • In Milwaukee Adrian will visit: Veolia, The Water Council, Wisconsin Economic Development Corporation, BREW Water Business Accelerator, and present about plant-based water treatment and the need for sustainable practices for the future; he will present at the University of Wisconsin.

  • In Detroit, Adrian will visit the Detroit River and Lake Huron to learn about the Institute of Water Research.; he would like to assemble a conference, inviting local water nonprofits, politicians, investors, and give a culminating speech on the potential for plant-based water treatment technology for both the developed and underdeveloped world. He will then present at the University of Detroit Mercy.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some of us just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! We're using plants to clean water, what more is there to say?

Social Media: 
www.everwatersco.com
Twitter: @everwatersco
Instagram: everwatersco
story_txt:
THE MILLENNIAL TRAINS PROJECT (MTP) is a 501(c)3 non-profit organization that leads crowd-funded transcontinental train journeys for diverse groups of young innovators (and virtual audiences) to explore America's new frontiers.
To get on board, applicants design a project to advance across the communities where our train stops and then race to be among the first 15 applicants on their selected train journey to reach their $5,000 crowdfunding goal. To learn more about the 2016 journeys click here. The applicant's project is described below.

 

Through a 10-day cross-country trip, our project will unify multiple stakeholders in the water sector to determine the economic, political, and technical requirements needed to commercialize this technology in developed and underdeveloped communities across the world. 
We are making this:



It's a plant-based water filter that removes over 99.99% of harmful microbes, lead, the taste of chlorine, and other things you don't want to drink.


WHY IT'S IMPORTANT TO US: 
783 million people drink water that looks like this: 

 
Contaminated water is responsible for 3.4 million deaths, mostly children, each year and it claims more lives than malaria, AIDS, and measles combined: more than 15,000 per day. 
No one should die from drinking dirty water. 
Our most recent test showed this:


Our filter uses a plant that grows in almost all the places that lack clean water, meaning this will be BIG.

.
Your contribution will help make this vision become a reality. Learn more below and join our mission!
 
What You Get
A donation for $10 and our Co-Founders will send you a personal thank you letter for your contribution. 



                  
A donation for $30 and you'll receive three pieces of hand-crafted Massai Jewelry from the Lemongo community, located near Kimana, Kenya. This includes bracelets, necklaces, office ornaments, and will support local businesses. You'll also receive a personal thank you letter. 
A donation for $50 and receive one of our exclusive company T-shirts, officially inducting you into the team, three-pieces of Maasai Jewelry, and a personal thank you letter. 



A donation for $100 and you'll get to choose one photograph, taken by our team, from a Safari at Kenya's Amboseli National park to be enlarged to a 24'' x 36'' poster. It is perfect for framing and hanging in your room, office, or home! Wow! You'll also receive a company t-shirt and a personal thank you letter. 




A donation for $200 and you'll get a Safari poster, a company t-shirt, three pieces of Maasai Jewelry, Moringa leaf powder, a highly nutritious food, and Moringa seed oil, which is great for your skin, and a personal thank you letter.


   The Impact Our 10-day campaign is designed to accomplish the following: 





Identify the perceived
risks, needs, unexpected benefits, and incentives of each
stakeholder—politicians, investors, private utilities, customers,
environmentalists, researchers, etc.—associated with the commercialization of
plant-based water treatment technology in the developed and underdeveloped
world


Spread the awareness of
plant-based water treatment technology and its advantages of use in the developed
and underdeveloped world for water treatment to approximately 10,000+
individuals


Spread the awareness of
the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals and the desire to provide the
rest of the world access to clean water


Speak to at least 2,500
Millennials, or 500 per University visited at each MTP stop, whom are enrolled
at a University, about the global water crisis and plant-based water treatment
technology with the goal of encouraging more students to pursue social
entrepreneurship

Connect to potential Venture
Capital firms interested in water treatment technology interested in investing
in our company, Everwaters.
Identify the business
models of large scale water treatment facilities to determine the operational
costs of switching to a plant-based water treatment technique
Design a business model
for a municipal water treatment facility using plant-based chemicals
Identify the legislative and
technical requirements of using plant-based chemicals by meeting with Water
Councils and local politicians

 Unite stakeholders under
the mission of pursuing sustainable water treatment practices in the developed
and underdeveloped world

Determine a plan to fund
and operate the first-ever plant-based municipal water treatment facility in
underdeveloped communities
Identify the public health
risks of using aluminum sulfate, lime, and chlorine in industrial water
treatment practices


Below is the short itinerary as to what Adrian will be doing at each stop of the MTP journey. Some of the plans are bold, but that's the whole point of the journey!


In Los Angeles, Adrian will survey locals about current water treatment practices and spread awareness of using plants to clean water. Adrian will speak at UCLA and at the California State University about the water crisis, in both developed and underdeveloped communities, and the potential of using plants to solve these problems; he will also request to meet with Arnold Schwarzenegger, if possible, to spread awareness of our sustainable water treatment technology.



In San Francisco, Adrian will request to meet with Public Health Professionals and Water Researchers at Stanford and Berkeley to discuss the health concerns of current water treatment practices and outline the technical requirements associated with plant-based water treatment technology. Adrian will also schedule meetings with local investors to pitch the project idea. If possible, he will reach out to Elon Musk, with the goal championing sustainable technology for the future.  



In Denver, Adrian will visit the Colorado River Basin to work with local politicians and researchers to understand the risks associated with the use of chemicals and contamination of the aquifer and the policies associated with its usage; he will present at the University of Denver.



In Milwaukee Adrian will visit: Veolia, The Water Council, Wisconsin Economic Development Corporation, BREW Water Business Accelerator, and present about plant-based water treatment and the need for sustainable practices for the future; he will present at the University of Wisconsin.



In Detroit, Adrian will visit the Detroit River and Lake Huron to learn about the Institute of Water Research.; he would like to assemble a conference, inviting local water nonprofits, politicians, investors, and give a culminating speech on the potential for plant-based water treatment technology for both the developed and underdeveloped world. He will then present at the University of Detroit Mercy.




   Other Ways You Can Help

Some of us just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign! We're using plants to clean water, what more is there to say?

Social Media: www.everwatersco.comTwitter: @everwaterscoInstagram: everwatersco

story:
We are a skater run, non for profit Derby league based in Worcester, UK.

It's our dream to self fund through the early days of establishment, and we need you!

We're fundraising toward the cost of our training venue for the next 10 weeks, and equipment to make Worcester Roller Derby the most well supported league in the area.

So dig deep Derby fans, instead of going to Starbucks or Costa today, give £3 or £4 to us instead, and do the right thing today!

story:
3Deep was voted the most effective toothbrush in the world by its users who compared it with other high-end products! With its innovative oscillating, rotating, sonic technology and its 2 speed settings, 3Deep not only gets the job done better, it leaves you and your entire family with that bright, clean, beautiful Hollywood smile we all desire!

No batteries required! Simply plug and charge your 3Deep Sonic Toothbrush for countless uses that will leave you smiling every time!

No batteries required! Simply plug and charge your 3Deep Sonic Toothbrush for countless uses that will leave you smiling every time!

 

Functional Prototype

A prototype that demonstrates the functionality of the final product but has a different appearance.

 
Love our product? Share it with your friends! :) 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Hello, my name is Jack Cui, inventor of the 3Deep toothbrush. Let me echo what a wise man once said, “If you do not put all of your effort to create innovation, it is not a real innovation.” Even if you have as much as 20 years experience in product design and manufacturing like I do. Six years ago, my child got a toothache. The dentist advised us to use a better toothbrush, so I searched the electric toothbrush market. After trying a few high-end products, I still felt none of them were good enough for my child. It took 5 years of dental research, user studies, and product designing until I finally invented a more effective oscillating-rotating technology for our sonic toothbrush. Our users loved it! Soon after, my wife asked, “This is an amazing product you’ve created for our child with so much love! Now, how about you create something that innovative for me?” Suddenly, it hit me; I could add two more options for women’s facial care that will make my wife and many women out there extremely happy! I immediately started up our own business with a dedicated team of professionals under the name,3Deep Inc. in Saratoga, CA and our website (3deepcare.com) was booming! I also strongly believe in the words of Steve Jobs when he said, “Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.” The 3D-SONIC TOOTHBRUSH uses sonic, circular vibrations to thoroughly clean and buff your teeth. It’s far more effective at removing plaque by forcing toothpaste between your teeth than any other toothbrush on the market. In a world where the majority of cavities are caused by poor brushing, you need this kind of precision in a toothbrush! And as a bonus, the two additional heads for the 3D-Sonic are great for facial cleansing and massage. This multifaceted tool is the perfect gift for the whole family. And there is no need for batteries! You can recharge it over and over. Now, of course, 3D-Sonic can’t happen without your support. We need you to back our campaign today so we can produce the first run of this amazing product and spread the gift of beautiful smiles all over the world! So take control of your oral and facial health and pre-order your 3D-Sonic Toothbrush today!  
 
 
 

Risks and challenges

We have been preparing for the past year to minimize any possible risks. We have some product in stock and our manufacturing plant is poised to run smoothly. Our delivery times are expected to meet all set deadlines.

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

 1. How does 3Deep's 3D-SONIC Toothbrush differ from other Sonic Toothbrushes?

3Deep's 3D-SONIC Toothbrush cleans teeth fully in a three-dimensional way, while other Sonic Toothbrushes clean teeth as if they're a flat surface, and are especially weak in cleaning between teeth.

2.  What are 3Deep's 3D-SONIC Toothbrush capabilities?

Firstly, 3Deep 3-in-1 multifunction can clean not only teeth but also faces, and can even massage faces---in fact, its oscillating-rotating 3D-Sonic technology is highly effective in facial care. Secondly, 3Deep is far more effective at removing plaque than other products being sold. It’s a worthwhile investment because it not only helps reduce gum recession but also performs better at blasting away debris between gaps, thereby removing stains and polishing "pearly whites" for a healthier, happier mouth. Sonic toothbrushes use intense vibration to literally buff teeth while forcing toothpaste between teeth, which results in an impressively-polished feel.

3.  What are 3Deep's cleansing brush's and massaging head's capabilities?

Firstly, you can pamper yourself with an at-home spa treatment using 3Deep's added cleansing brush attachment that leaves your skin feeling clean, clear, fresh, and healthy. Secondly, you may finish your beauty routine with 3Deep's soft massaging head attachment, which may help relieve soreness and discomfort and may also help apply your favorite cream to better penetrate your skin to keep it both nourished and hydrated.

4. What are the main advantages of 3Deep's 3D-SONIC Toothbrush？

3Deep's 3D-SONIC Toothbrush represents a new generation of teeth-cleaning in three-dimensional way, which has cleansing advantages both in oscillating-rotating and sonic techniques.

5. How long can my teeth be whitened by using 3Deep?

3Deep will normally whiten teeth in 2 weeks.

6. Does 3Deep's metal handle safely avoid causing electric shocks?

3Deep's highest voltage is 4.2 volts, which is absolutely safe.

7. How many modes are available for 3Deep? How do I use it?

3Deep has two modes. When you are first press its button to turn it on, its gentle mode will continue for two minutes, after which you can activate its powerful mode by pressing its button twice more.

8. Does 3Deep include any automated functions?

Yes, 3Deep will automatically turn itself off after 2 minutes of disuse. It also automatically prompts users every 30 seconds to consider scrubbing another part of their teeth or face.

9. How many times can 3Deep be used on a single charge?

After being fully charged, 3Deep can be used 40 times (for 2 minutes each time) before needing to be recharged.

10. How can I know 3Deep is fully charged?

When 3Deep's green light stops flashing, it is fully charged.

11. How often should 3Deep's heads be changed?

We recommend changing 3Deep's 3 heads every 3 months.

12. How old must children be to start using 3Deep?

Children over age 4 can use 3Deep with parental guidance.

13. Is 3Deep noisy when it's being used?

3Deep operates quietly at less than 60 db.

14. Is 3Deep waterproof？

3Deep is designed to be water-resistant enough (with an IPX6 rating) that it may be washed.

15. How durable is 3Deep?

3Deep can normally be used for at least 2 years.

16. Will 3Deep's metal handles’ colors fade?

3Deep's handles will never fade.

17. Is 3Deep's charger usable worldwide?

Yes, 3Deep may be charged with voltage from 100V to 240V and with AC frequency from 50Hz to 60Hz, which renders it compatible with nearly all electrical systems worldwide. It uses two kinds of chargers, which are both the American Standard Charger (ASC) and the EU Standard Charger (ESC).

18. Will 3Deep become available in additional colors?

Perhaps; 3Deep Inc. would like to offer both grey and black, as well.

19. I am with the Early bird. How can I add more toothbrush head?

Add $11 to your current pledge, to show you want a pack of 4 additional toothbrush heads. Then at the end of the project, when we do our survey, we will get the details.

20. where can I buy extra heads in the future? If I want to order more heads here now, how can I make a pledge?

3Deep will start global marketing network for sales on Ebay and Amazon after the campaign is completed. So you can buy all kinds of heads you need over there. 
If you want to order more heads here now, just Add $11 to your current pledge, to show you want a pack of 4 additional toothbrush heads. Then at the end of the project, when we do our survey, we will get the details.

story:
Our mother, Shari Dunnington, was diagnosed with glioblastoma (brain cancer) approximately two years ago, at only 52 years old.  She fought the disease with radiation, chemotherapy, and ultimately neurosurgery in April 2012.  The cost of treatment, and now at-home care for basic daily care, has been astronomical, even with insurance.  Shari’s husband, Mark, has been at her side every step of the way, and he has bravely endured the heavy emotional and physical toll of watching his wife die.  

 

Mom is a huge fan of the Kansas City Chiefs, the Jayhawks, and loved attending an annual trip to Iowa City for tailgating and Hawkeyes football! Mom has always loved life, and was a problem-solver by nature.  Prior to becoming too ill to care for herself, Mom fought this disease with everything she had.  Although she certainly has felt fear, anger, and a range of other emotions, she always put on a brave face and smile.  When her medication led to a 40+ pound weight gain, she and Mark came up with humorous nicknames  (e.g. “Puff Mama”) to cope.   Of course, she loves her children, parents, and extended family, but Mom’s love for Mark knows no bounds.  As treatment options dwindled, Mom told her doctors that she HAD to make it to her 20-year wedding anniversary, which she did on August 1, 2012.  This campaign has been initiated to help defray the financial costs of treatment and end-of-life care.  We would also like to send Mark to Sanibel Island in Florida, where he and mom enjoyed a honeymoon trip nearly 20 years ago.  We thank you for your support.

Donating is safe, secure, and can be anonymouse if you choose. 100% of the funds will go towards paying  for expenses and helping the family (A small % is taken by indiegogo)

ANYTHING AND EVERYTHING HELPS, EVEN IF YOU CAN ONLY AFFORD $1
