story:
FAMILY NEEDS WATER IN WISCONSIN

A homeschooling single mother of 3 children's well went out 17 days ago at the time of posting.  They need a new well dug.  We are experiencing sub 0 temps in Wisconsin and sometimes extreme winter weather.  They live on a very small farm which is their sole source of income.  They do not have debt but have no way to pay for this well.  PLEASE CONSIDER IN YOUR HEART giving even $5.00 to help them fund their well.  I am this woman's neighbor, I love her, she is the strongest, most dedicated woman I know to her children.  PLEASE HELP THEM!  

5000 DOLLARS NEEDED FOR WELL!!!

I am hoping to raise enough money to pay for her well.  We have raised 1,260.00 already and according to the estimate, still need $5000.00.   ALL FUNDS will go towards the purchase of this well!!! 

The Impact

This family will get RUNNING WATER back into their home.  Currently each day the neighbors are delivering gallons of water a day to water farm animals and drinking water.  Your contribution will save this family and their animals!!! Out of privacy for the family, the picture posted is the weather we are experiencing right now while they go without water. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign, pray for this family to be blessed with the funding to pay for a well, and pray for their health and well being and strength to get through this difficult time and please pray for people to find it in their heart to give, even $5.00.  Every small contribution will add up to a big contribution. NO CONTRIBUTION will go unappreciated.

story:
Short Summary

We are a family of five. Jelena is 11, and the youngest of our three children. Jelena has idiopathic anaphlaxis, urticarial tissue reaction, urticarial vasculitis and migraines. With that being said, she also has other symptoms that are not or have not been addressed yet. She gets pasty pale and flushed, has low grade to moderate fevers, enlarged lymph nodes, eruptions over her entire body (similar to an aggressive rash), and severe fatigue. We travel five hours one way to Rochester Minnesota to see her medical team at Mayo Clinic. We have expenses such as hotel, food, gas, and any uncovered medical bills, in addition to our already stretched household budget. We have been going to Mayo often and because of how often we are running out of financial means to make this happen. Recently Jelena's medications have drastically changed. We are cautiously optimistic, and pray for a positive outcome of these new medicine changes. If Jelena does not respond favorable to the recent changes, we can expect an increased frequency of our visits to Mayo.

Not having the financial means to see her medical team could be a devastating reality.

What We Need

At this time we are seeking $5000, which would help us recover from the debt we have incurred up to this point and help financially with our next couple trips. This will only run for 6o days.

The Impact

Your donation will help Jelena and her family to be able to concentrate on whats most important not worring about which bill will not get payed to make the next trip. We have traveled four times already and more to come. You will be making a huge difference in our lives.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.

  • Please use Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Who We Are

We are a group of physicians & engineers working together to solve some of today's healthcare challenges.  Tobacco smoking has long been associated with many health problems, including many forms of cancer.  It remains one of the most commonly used substance in our society.  

Why is nicotine appealing?  It helps many to deal with stress, to better focus on tasks and to even better remember things.  

We all agree that the negative consequences outweigh the short-term positives.  

In fact, many smokers want to quit!!  Based on a Health Canada survey, 50% of smokers report “own health” as the predominant reason for quitting. 

**See Image in Gallery**

Nicotine smoking is extremely difficult to quit because it is addictive, both physiologically and psychological and psycho-socially.  This makes smoking cessation a challenge for both healthcare professionals and smokers.

Approximately 71% of current smokers report that they had consulted a physician about smoking.  However, the challenges of quitting smoking is so large that many general clinics refer smokers to a more specialised service. 

ModoMe team at Medmodo recognises these challenges!  We incorporated today’s mobile technology to the latest in substance use behavioural treatment methods.  

Our team spent months developing this tool for clinical use.  Using state-of-the-art ‘intelligence’ protocol and latest security protection, we are looking forward to helping smokers quit!!

The exciting part of ModoMe is that this tool is adaptive and 'learns' from our users. We know that everyone has different priorities and patterns, this is why ModoMe is designed to be a personal tool to the users.  

WE NEED YOUR HELP!!

We are looking to raise $50,000 to support the cost of programming and implementing this mobile app.  Adherence is a major factor in healthcare outcomes.  The fee for service model in North American healthcare leaves chronic illness patients with little support in one of the most crucial aspects of their treatment.  We intend to fill that gap and provide these patients with a tool to help keep them on track.  The estimated cost of building such an app is $150,000.  We are hoping to get just a part of that through this campaign.  Thank You for your interest!

Don’t forget our perks!!  Medmodo is a start-up with a mission to tackle health and healthcare challenges.  That doesn’t mean that we don’t know how to have fun!  Check out our other projects and see how you can get involved!!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate to our campaign, you can still help by telling your friends about us and our goal to provide a modern tool to improve healthcare delivery for those with chronic illnesses.

Thank you for your support!!

story:
We, the gentlemen of Zeta Beta Tau Fraternity, Sigma Chapter, are beginning our annual Get On The Ball campaign! 

What Is Get On The Ball?

From April 15-18, we will be rolling a GIANT 6-foot ball around campus and various parts of New Orleans in order to obtain as many signatures as possible. We have obtained sponsorships from various organizations and with each signature, we will be able to donate more money to the CMN. We are hoping to raise over $5,000.

What Does the Children's Miracle Network Do?
Children's Miracle Network Hospitals is celebrating its 30-year anniversary! Since 1983, the organization has raised more than $4.7 billion—most of it $1 at a time—for 170 children’s hospitals across the United States and Canada, which, in turn, use the money where it’s needed the most. These donations have gone to support research and training, purchase equipment, and pay for uncompensated care, all in support of the mission to save and improve the lives of as many children as possible.
Provide $2.5 billion in charity (uncompensated) care each year.
- Treat 98% of all children needing heart or lung transplants.
- Treat 88% of all children with cancer.
- Treat 90% of all children with sickle cell anemia.

Why Should I Donate?
All money we raise will be directly donated to the Children's Miracle Network. Your donations will be directly helping the fight against pediatric illnesses and enhancing the lives of these affected children.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • My name is Curt McLean and I am a born Jamaican,but I live in Canada now. For the past years I have been going Back to my country to referee basketball games and there are a lot of kids that are in the community,some of them don't even have shoes on their feet,shirt on their backs and some have torn clothes on. I was so upset to see all these kids looking like they have no parents as I did my game. After the game was over I sat with some of them and bought them some food and asked where their parents are and and when they told me they don't no,it mad me cry.
  • So at that point I said to my self,what can i do to help these poor kids who have nothing in life to look forward to?So as I see that they love the game of basketball why not go back and teach them the basic skills of the sport and show them some love that they can not get at home. All these kids want is some attention and love and that is what we are going to try to do.
  • Just imagine how a child feels getting a gum or candy,with your help these kids can look forward to another day as we go into the community and have a camp for about 400 of them, clothes them,feed them and even supply shoes for them.I can just imagine how they would feel so loved and appreciative,I think that this will for sure make a life difference for the parents and the community it self would gladly embrace us for doing what we have done for their child and the life we have just changed. 

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • The funding that is needed will pay for the following: we need 2 back boards and rims which is about $500 USD each,we would love to put some bleachers in so the parents and community can watch the games,there is not enough light there for night games so we would like to put one more light pole in,we also would like to re do the courts with  new lines and rubber  surface area as the bad weather really takes a toll on the concrete which is not good for the kids if the fall down. So in total for this court it will be around $50,000 or so. If we do not reach our goal we would fix what we can with what we get and continue to raise funds until goal is reached.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • I think this project is  very valuable because of what you are doing to help keep the youth off the streets as if there is no basketball court means that they will have to roam the streets and get them selves in trouble with the law,so you are showing the kids that you care about their well being. I have been working in Toronto in the same kids of communities for many years now and I can say that I have changed many lives.
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Other Ways You Can Help

for all those that want to help but they cant ,we need t-shirts,running shoes,socks,clothes,basketballs,basketball uniforms and what ever else you can come up with,what ever is provided to us is much appreciated as the families will be so great full. So please spread the word about the inner city basketball camps to all your friend,co workers,family and employer and let them know to go to Indiegogo and pledge,thank you.

story:
In our last campaign, 281 funders contributed a total of $31,667 and reserved the very first ThumbTrack™ devices.

Now we’re back on Indiegogo with an improved version of ThumbTrack™. Here’s your chance to reserve one of the first devices that roll off the production line and be part of the mouse (r)evolution.

FAQ's


What about ring sizes? When do backers get to choose their ring size?

ThumbTrack™ fits small and large fingers alike due to the detachable back-section of ThumbTrack™ being made from a flexible rubber-like material.

We provide all backers with 3 differently sized back-flaps (S, M, L) to guarantee a 100% snug fit.


Is ThumbTrack™ available for left-handers?

The device can be worn either on your left or right hand without restrictions in usability.


What material is ThumbTrack™ made of?

The surface part and some inner structural parts of the thick section are made from ABS plastic. The thinner section is made from a rubber-like material and the whole inner lining as well as the sides are rubberized.


Is ThumbTrack™ waterproof?

The device is resistant to sweat and the occasional splash.


What colors does the ThumbTrack™ come in?

The device is available in Pitch Black and Pure White.


What kind of warranty do you offer?

We offer a one year limited international warranty against manufacturing defects for the main unit, the Nano USB Dongle and rubber back-flaps.

We offer a 6 month limited international warranty against manufacturing defects for the inbuilt battery and a 1-month exchange warranty for the charging cable. 

In all warranty cases, you will need to pay for shipping to the nearest service center.

Service center partners who provide repair or exchange services will be based in the United States, Europe and Hong Kong.


How long does the battery last?

The End-of-Life span of the Li-ion battery will occur in approximately three years.

On a daily basis the device works for approximately 15 continuous hours without needing to recharge, depending on your usage and charging scenario.

Battery re-charge time from empty to full will take approximately 2 hours.


Can I replace the battery myself?

We advice against replacing the battery yourself. The custom manufactured Li-on battery is not commercially available and is encased in the ring.

Once the battery is worn down, you can send us your ThumbTrack™ and we’ll replace the battery for a small fee.


Is ThumbTrack™ an HID Device?

Yes, ThumbTrack™ and the RF receiver are HID compliant.


Do I have to install the provided software to make ThumbTrack™ work?

No, the software only adds extended features. As soon as you plug in the tiny wireless USB receiver / dongle into your Windows, Linux PC or Mac -  your ThumbTrack™ is instantly functional.


Which devices and Operating Systems will ThumbTrack™ work on?

ThumbTrack™ devices and software is compatible with OSX 10.6.8 and upwards as well as Windows XP, Win 7, Win 8 upwards and Linux.


Does ThumbTrack™ work on Android and iOS?

ThumbTrack™ is not supported on Android and iOS.


Is ThumbTrack™ based on Bluetooth Technology?

ThumbTrack™ operates on a 2.4 GHz Radio Frequency similar to Bluetooth and runs a custom-written protocol for communication between the wireless USB dongle/receiver and ThumbTrack™.

We have opted for this alternative hardware and software solution because:

- Our protocol is more device specific than the general Bluetooth protocol
- It provides superior battery life
- It provides better connectivity (less disconnect issues and no pairing issues)
- It allows us to offer ThumbTrack™ at a more affordable rate to you as we won't need to license Bluetooth technology

For the same reasons, established computer peripheral manufacturers such as Microsoft and Logitech use their own proprietary 2.4 GHz protocols instead of Bluetooth, for most of their computer mice.


Who can order?

ThumbTrack™ is available worldwide to all countries excluding residents of countries that fall under US embargo and residents of Belize due to local laws.


Can I get multiple perks?

Sure, you may choose as many perks as you like.

If you would like to make a bulk order, please contact us at bulkorder [at] mindstreaminc [dot] com


Where do I enter my preferred color choice?

Once we are ready to ship the perks out, we will send all backers a survey in which they can choose their preferred color(s) and verify or change their shipping address.



I do not have a credit card? How else can I purchase a perk?

Unfortunately, we can only accept credit card purchases at this time. All transactions are securely processed by Indiegogo and MindStream Inc. does not receive your card details.

To be notified if and when an alternative payment option becomes available, please fill in this brief form.


Legal Disclaimer:

Delivery date of the rewards/perks listed on this page are subject to the best efforts of the team and similar to other crowd funding campaigns are not guaranteed. This disclaimer has been added to set reasonable expectations for our contributors/funders.

Please note that all crowd funding contributions are considered final; we do not offer refunds.

©2014 MindStream Inc. All rights reserved. The information published herein is provided “as is” and is subject to change without prior notice.


Please feel free to contact us in the comments section or at thumbtrack [at] mindstreaminc [dot] com should you have any questions, concerns or feedback.

Thank you!
story_txt:
In our last campaign, 281 funders contributed a total of $31,667 and reserved the very first ThumbTrack™ devices. Now we’re back on Indiegogo with an improved version of ThumbTrack™.
Here’s your chance to reserve one of the first devices that roll off the production line and be part of the mouse (r)evolution.


FAQ's
What about ring
sizes? When do backers get to choose their ring size? 
ThumbTrack™ fits small and large fingers alike due to the detachable back-section
of ThumbTrack™ being made from a flexible rubber-like material. 
We provide all backers with 3 differently sized back-flaps (S, M, L) to
guarantee a 100% snug fit. Is ThumbTrack™ available for left-handers? 
The device can be worn either on your left or right hand without restrictions
in usability. What material is ThumbTrack™ made of? 
The surface part and some inner structural parts of the thick section are made
from ABS plastic. The thinner section is made from a rubber-like material and
the whole inner lining as well as the sides are rubberized. Is ThumbTrack™ waterproof?

story:
The world's first Sports Hydration Ice Pop made for runners. With 100% all natural ingredients, it's a cool, healthy snack after a run!

In the battle of runners against sugary sports drinks, only one brand can save the running community!

Runners NEED to hydrate, so they pick up those commercial sports drinks that are packed with artificial flavors and sugars because there is no other option on the market for them.

Introducing... RUNNER POPS!


 Runner Pops are the world's first Sports Hydration Ice Pop made for runners! Made with 100% all natural ingredients, Runner Pops are a refreshing, HEALTHY, and of course, a DELICIOUS way to hydrate after a run!


"As a runner, I always want to perform my best! In order to do so, I need to fuel my body with ONLY the best to KEEP ON RUNNING!"

The Goal of the Runner Pops Campaign

If I'm able to raise the necessary funds, I intend to use the money to get all the necessary permits, rent a commercial kitchen, and start making inventory to approach stores and races so that they can stock Runner Pops, and make it easy for you to get them for your next run!

In the beginning, I plan to approach specialty running shops, local grocers, etc. Once I receive the constant support of the Runner Pops fan base, I will then try to get it into bigger markets.

I spent almost 8 months experimenting with different ALL Natural ingredients to not only make Runner Pops delicious, but to make them healthy, with all the essential nutrients to help runners hydrate after a run! Runner Pops do not contain any dairy products, preservatives, or any artificial sweeteners. I truly believe in this product, and people who have tried it all love it! I will work day in and day out, pushing this product, so that stores will want to stock Runner Pops

By contributing to this campaign, you will not only be contributing to Runner Pops, you will also be contributing to the health of the running community!

So what are you waiting for? Come run with us and get everyone to KEEP ON RUNNING, and get some cool rewards at the same time!


Check us out at RunnerPops.com


Be the first of your friends to...

story:
(Sorry about the inconsistencies in the video, I made it when I was reaching out to facebook friends and family and was eventually convinced that going with indiegogo was a good idea.)

Who?

Hi, I'm Nick Glauber. You're probably a friend or family member of mine and you know full well who I am. If not, perhaps you know me from Check it Out, Comrade! on duckfeed.tv, or just "the internet" in general.

In any case, I'm a Type 1 Diabetic. It's not my fault, my immune system is just really dumb. This means my body no longer produces insulin on it's own and I have to do all the work of a pancreas myself. A big part of this is monitoring blood glucose (or blood sugar) levels to see how far off target I am, and then taking insulin or glucose to bring me down or up to be closer to target levels. 

The CGM

Currently, checking my blood glucose levels is done the "standard" way: by pricking a finger, pushing a drop of blood out, and feeding that into a glucose meter. This has to be done every time I need to have an idea of where I am at, which is all the time. I probably do this about 10-20 times a day.

But, there's a different way available. A Continuous Glucose Monitor has a sensor that sits just under the skin and communicates wirelessly with a receiver. The device then automatically checks your blood sugar every 5 minutes, which is incredible. You can actually see trends and preemptively treat for highs or lows before they start having a negative impact.

I've been working with my doctor, insurance, and the manufacturer to get approved for a Dexcom G4 Platinum Continuous Glucose Monitor, which is currently the best CGM on the market. They finally approved me, but the out-of-pocket cost of $600 is a little out of my reach. I'm hoping my friends and family can pitch in and help me get this incredible device that is going to vastly improve my quality of life.


Funding Details

I've set the goal at $1000 dollars, as this will with absolute certainty (even after the cut taken by IndieGoGo and credit card/paypal fees) cover the cost of the meter ($600) as well as doctors visits and additional supplies. 

This is set up as a flex-funding campaign. No matter what, anything contributed will go towards paying for the CGM, and any supplies or doctor visits surrounding. 

  • Extra funds will go towards future sensors and transmitters, as those are replaced every week and 6 months respectively. 
  • If we do not meet the whole goal, I will use whatever contributions were given and do everything in my power to still make this happen.


Thank you all for being so supportive already. It really means a lot to me.

story:
NEW PERK!

HYDRATE YOU + SAVE THE PLANET

We're practicing yoga that TRANSFORMS here so... It's no secret we are going to SWEAT in our FLUX POWER YOGA CLASSES! And I want to provide you with an endless supply of clean, filtered water. It's going to cost $3,000 to buy the hardware and run water the pipes into the studio. We want you to stay well hydrated with the best quality water, without creating plastic water bottle waste!

So we will need one of these water filters:

So you can do this...

Without buying these...

And Together We Will Do this...

Thank you for going into this Stretch goal with me!!

 

About Me and My new project:

FLUX Power Yoga

I'm Melissa Longfellow. I live to share power yoga. Yoga has SAVED me in so many ways; from torn ligaments and back pain to a broken heart and spirit. I'm committed to teaching, learning and sharing... from the bottom of my heart to yours. I'm so excited to bring FLUX Power Yoga to Bellingham! And I'm at a crucial point in building the studio and I really, truly NEED your help right now. We are almost there, construction has begun and I'm $15,000 away from being able to finish it off with infrared heat to make this an EPIC yoga studio. I'm calling on You, my Tribe, to make the difference for me right now. Your contribution will get you some AMAZING deals on yoga classes, memberships and cool FLUX shwag!  Let's do this together. Please read on... Thank you!

The studio construction is under way! Look at all the natural light. We are going to light it up in here, I can't wait for you to join me!

Our amazing location: 1140 10th Street, Suite 101 (downtown Fairhaven) Bellingham, WA.

What's Epic about FLUX Power Yoga

  1. RESULTS: Fast, noticeable results in your body and in your life.
  2. CONFIDENCE: Learn something new every single class, accelerating body strength and confidence.
  3. FUN: Yes, yoga can be fun! We're going to work hard together as a tribe and we're going to have fun!
  4. HEAT: Infrared-heat. The best, high-tech yoga heating system in Bellingham. A deep and natural sweat will leave you feeling energized!

INFRARED HEAT is KEY

Key benefits:

  • Increased Flexibility  Stretch muscles 3x more.
  • Increased Circulation  Stimulates blood flow. Detoxification  One word: SWEAT.
  • Weight Loss  Burns calories, increases metabolism.
  • Pain Relief  By penetrating tissues.

The panels themselves are from our friends at Heating Green right here in Bellingham!

        Heating Green -- A local company!

 

 

Take a look at the panels hanging from the ceiling they're like sunshine beaming down on us!

The Budget & What I Still Need

I've funded nearly all of it myself. Now I'm asking for your help to pay for the 16 Infrared Heating panels and the electrical we will install to support it. $18,800 is the magic number. If you can help me raise $15,000, together we will hit the goal!

    PERKS! Shwag! What You Get...

    The great part of contributing and joining our tribe is you actually GET MORE than you give in this campaign!

    Sweet deals on YOGA packages!

    Awesome FLUX gear!

    Discounted rates you will NEVER see again. These prices are only for this campaign. It's our way of thanking you for being our "Original Tribe" Hey! That would make a great Tee Shirt! If you are not local to Washington, you can get podcast classes with me and cool FLUX merch!

    Nuf said...check out all our cool perks and choose one now because the best ones will SELL OUT!

     

    Perks... Get ''em while they're hot!

     

    My Promise to You

    I know what it takes to be successful: COMMITMENT. I promise I'm 100x100% committed to our students and to the business. Your support will not only help me create an independent business that supports healthy bodies, hearts and minds, but it will generate a Tribe of people who are transforming their own lives and the community. 

    They say "It takes a village" - a Tribe. I want to acknowledge you for being part of my Tribe. It's truly because of you that I'm able to launch such a bold campaign. I'm so grateful for you!

    Your Thumbs Up is Everything

    If you believe in transforming the world for the better, please consider giving this campaign some shares with your circle.  It's easy to share using the Indiegogo share tools and your shout out would truly mean the world to me.

    Thank you!

story: demos.
story_txt: demos.

story:
FEATURED IN

WE ARE…

We are designers, and we are divers. We design the way we want to dive.  The AAK 180 Diving Mask is a passion driven project. It´s our dream diving mask. It´s the result of an immense amount of effort and work. There are tears, sweat and blood in this project.

We are an Industrial Design Company and we focus on the balance between beauty and function. My name is Jose Antonio Viladoms and I am a passionate diver who always found  problems with my diving equipment, so as a designer I took on the task to resolve on how to free my vision under water;  after all, diving its about sight seeing.  

And that is how Aak Diving was created, with an incredible and passionate group, that wants to create better equipment, for better diving. We took this amazing ride to create the first single lens peripheral vision diving mask.  At this point, we are thrilled, happy, and scared all at once. And in need of your help to finally take the AAK 180 Diving Mask to production.

THE AAK 180 DIVING MASK

The 180 Aak Diving Mask is designed to give greater vision. Common masks have a limited range of vision, to appreciate the whole environment, you need to turn your head from side to side. With that in mind, we needed to create a mask with peripheral vision. Allowing lateral view, other masks don´t have. With the 180, there is greater freedom of movement and vision. Allowing a much better diving experience.

But it has not been easy. The 180 Aak Diving Mask is made of a single curved lens, which has required three years of studies, material analysis and testing to get what we have today. A unique mask, not only in terms of vision underwater, but also in design, materials and comfort.

The main innovation, and what makes it so special, is the peripheral vision. Common masks, have only the front view, with limited side vision. Underwater, to look at the sides with a normal mask, you need to turn your head.

The 180, is designed for easy viewing, to give a greater visual experience of diving. The tricky thing about this is that the refraction of light is different underwater and therefore has been difficult to reach our current results.

180 consists of a single lens made of polycarbonate, with several layers. These layers prevent deformations of objects, as double vision and image distortion.

FEATURES OF THE 180

The peripheral vision mask with ultra- wide panoramic view.

• Designed to give complete freedom and ultra-wide panoramic view on your diving experience.

• Real peripheral vision and clarity.

• Made with Optical Polycarbonate, a light and clear material.

•Single lens that provides better vision and comfort.

• Scratch resistant cover.

• Skirt: TPE (Elastomer Thermoplastic) Hypoallergenic and UVH UV protection,

• Fits almost every face (Medium and Large).

• Head support, holds mask perfectly in place.

• Exclusive two piece strap system, allows to open and close, in a quick and comfortable way. When you release the strap, the mask falls on the chest.

MATERIALS

• Skirt: TPE (Elastomer Thermoplastic) Hypoallergenic and UVH UV protection, used for baby products.

• Lens: Polycarbonate Optical LQ Makrolon 3187

• Buckles: Steel with a zinc alloy

MEAUSURES

•           - Weight: 324 grams

•           - Height: 11 cm

•           - Depth: 12.5cm

•           - Front: 21 cm

THE STRAP

Another new element of the 180 is the strap, designed for better comfort, before, during and after diving.

• Its design helps to adjust the mask to the face, so it will not move.

• The two-piece system, helps to release it quickly and , with one movement, it falls on the chest, keeping  your hands free and without danger of losing the 180.

• Easy to put the mask on and off.

• Made of nylon 3/4 " (1.9cm ). With UV protection.

• Convenient and easy to use.

 
 

 

 

 

THE BAG

The 180 Aak Diving Mask comes with an ultra light and soft neoprene bag, designed to protect your mask, and give you a comfortable way to carry it wherever you dive.

THE T-SHIRT

WE NEED

This project started 3 years ago, and after investigation, design, engineering prototyping and testing we are ready to finish the molds and produce.  It´s been a long journey and now we need your help to get $23,000 US.  We made our numbers and this is the money we need to start production. We want to finish the project we started 3 years ago, and that will, with your help, revolutionize the way we see the underwater world.

We hope you like the 180 as much as we do. Please join this project and help us change your diving experience...

Thank you!

 

THE PERKS

WHAT YOU GET

What if we don´t achieve our goals?

Whether we reach our goal or not, be sure you will get  the Aak 180 diving mask or your selected Perk

Life is all about goals and pushing oneself to the limit. With the  Aak180  diving mask we, have done just that. And by having donated to our campaign, you have joined our tribe; you have made yourself part of our effort, of our family. And for that, you will always be in our hearts.

Because after all, when a member of our tribe calls out for us, we will respond and we will deliver.

The Aak Tribe

 

TIME TABLE

WE CHOSE TO BE FREE

To leave the world we know and do what we love. To go in the deep, float and feel like we are flying. We want to make the ordinary extraordinary. We want to make a difference.

This is our life, our moment, our journey, our way to be free.

We choose to live a life of passion, and adventure. We choose to dive, to let the sea cast its spell, and fall in love with the big blue.

We dare to be free. We are the dreamers, the bold, the risk lovers, the chance takers, the passion driven free souls of diving.

We belong to this tribe, cause we just love to dive.
story_txt:
FEATURED INWE ARE…We are designers, and we are divers. We design the way we want to dive.  The AAK 180 Diving Mask is a passion driven project. It´s our dream diving mask. It´s the result of an immense amount of effort and work. There are tears, sweat and blood in this project.We are an Industrial Design Company and we focus on the balance between beauty and function. My name is Jose Antonio Viladoms and I am a passionate diver who always found  problems with my diving equipment, so as a designer I took on the task to resolve on how to free my vision under water;  after all, diving its about sight seeing.  And that is how Aak Diving was created, with an incredible and passionate group, that wants to create better equipment, for better diving. We took this amazing ride to create the first single lens peripheral vision diving mask.  At this point, we are thrilled, happy, and scared all at once. And in need of your help to finally take the AAK 180 Diving Mask to production.THE AAK 180 DIVING MASKThe 180 Aak Diving Mask is designed to give greater vision. Common masks have a limited range of vision, to appreciate the whole environment, you need to turn your head from side to side. With that in mind, we needed to create a mask with peripheral vision. Allowing lateral view, other masks don´t have. With the 180, there is greater freedom of movement and vision. Allowing a much better diving experience.But it has not been easy. The 180 Aak Diving Mask is made of a single curved lens, which has required three years of studies, material analysis and testing to get what we have today. A unique mask, not only in terms of vision underwater, but also in design, materials and comfort.The main innovation, and what makes it so special, is the peripheral vision. Common masks, have only the front view, with limited side vision. Underwater, to look at the sides with a normal mask, you need to turn your head.The 180, is designed for easy viewing, to give a greater visual experience of diving. The tricky thing about this is that the refraction of light is different underwater and therefore has been difficult to reach our current results.180 consists of a single lens made of polycarbonate, with several layers. These layers prevent deformations of objects, as double vision and image distortion.FEATURES OF THE 180The peripheral vision mask with ultra- wide panoramic view.• Designed to give complete freedom and ultra-wide panoramic view on your diving experience.• Real peripheral vision and clarity.• Made with Optical Polycarbonate, a light and clear material.•Single lens that provides better vision and comfort.• Scratch resistant cover.• Skirt: TPE (Elastomer Thermoplastic) Hypoallergenic and UVH UV protection,• Fits almost every face (Medium and Large).• Head support, holds mask perfectly in place.• Exclusive two piece strap system, allows to open and close, in a quick and comfortable way. When you release the strap, the mask falls on the chest.MATERIALS• Skirt: TPE (Elastomer Thermoplastic) Hypoallergenic and UVH UV protection, used for baby products.• Lens: Polycarbonate Optical LQ Makrolon 3187• Buckles: Steel with a zinc alloyMEAUSURES•           - Weight: 324 grams•           - Height: 11 cm•           - Depth: 12.5cm•           - Front: 21 cmTHE STRAPAnother new element of the 180 is the strap, designed for better comfort, before, during and after diving.• Its design helps to adjust the mask to the face, so it will not move.• The two-piece system, helps to release it quickly and , with one movement, it falls on the chest, keeping  your hands free and without danger of losing the 180.• Easy to put the mask on and off.• Made of nylon 3/4 " (1.9cm ). With UV protection.• Convenient and easy to use. 
    THE BAGThe 180 Aak Diving Mask comes with an ultra light and soft neoprene bag, designed to protect your mask, and give you a comfortable way to carry it wherever you dive.THE T-SHIRTWE NEEDThis project started 3 years ago, and after investigation, design, engineering prototyping and testing we are ready to finish the molds and produce.  It´s been a long journey and now we need your help to get $23,000 US.  We made our numbers and this is the money we need to start production. We want to finish the project we started 3 years ago, and that will, with your help, revolutionize the way we see the underwater world.We hope you like the 180 as much as we do. Please join this project and help us change your diving experience...Thank you! THE PERKSWHAT YOU GETWhat if we don´t achieve our goals?Whether we reach our goal or not, be sure you will get  the Aak 180 diving mask or your selected PerkLife is all about goals and pushing oneself to the limit. With the  Aak180  diving mask we, have done just that. And by having donated to our campaign, you have joined our tribe; you have made yourself part of our effort, of our family. And for that, you will always be in our hearts.Because after all, when a member of our tribe calls out for us, we will respond and we will deliver.The Aak Tribe TIME TABLEWE CHOSE TO BE FREETo leave the world we know and do what we love. To go in the deep, float and feel like we are flying. We want to make the ordinary extraordinary. We want to make a difference.This is our life, our moment, our journey, our way to be free.We choose to live a life of passion, and adventure. We choose to dive, to let the sea cast its spell, and fall in love with the big blue.We dare to be free. We are the dreamers, the bold, the risk lovers, the chance takers, the passion driven free souls of diving.We belong to this tribe, cause we just love to dive.

story:
The Black Nerd's Baked Goods is a side project I've been doing since 2011. I would attend local concerts with cookies in tow and sell them. In 2013, I tabled at the Small Press Expo in Bethesda, MD where I did my first big selling of cookies. I don't have a specialty but I love to experiment so my specialty is whatever you want it to be.

This time around, the bake sale will once again towards upgrading my previous equipment; a new cellphone, a new capture card, small things like cables and the like. But it was also go towards helping me live! So that's a plus!

My favorite part! This time around, instead of 2 flavors, I'm doubling that! FOUR FLAVORS! OH DANG! OH JEEZ!

Check the perks for all the various configurations you can get them in!

I'm glad you asked! I've pooled some responses from people who have eaten anything I've baked and here are the responses:

High Res Version

High Res Version

High Res Version
And lastly...


From the bottom of my heart, I want to thank you for at the very least looking at this! If you want to spread this around, I would be very appreciative.

If you need further The Black Nerd's Baked Goods information, you can check me out on Facebook here: https://www.facebook.com/TBNBG
